title: Some useful habits
body:
1. Long term tasks should be started as soon as possible
   Generally speaking, long-term tasks are always annoying and difficult, and people always tend to avoid difficulties. The final result is either to give up at last, or to rush to work with a little time left; I also learned this lesson before. I deceived myself and others by saying "live a relaxed life and put aside annoyance". I was in a hurry to deal with it in the last few days, which made me feel embarrassed.
   Later, I found that this practice is actually counterproductive. If you adjust your mental state and understand the situation as soon as possible, it does not necessarily bring psychological pressure. On the contrary, because you have plenty of time, you are confident to grasp the progress. Even if you encounter sudden problems in the middle, you still have time to solve them; More importantly, starting as soon as possible can make full use of the time of leftover materials: for example, if I receive a document and need to give comments in three days, I will browse it roughly on the same day. In the next three days, I will be able to think in spare time such as taking a car, walking, etc., and the effect is good. If I don't understand it as soon as possible, these time will be wasted, He didn't do anything meaningful (Archimedes couldn't think of a way to detect the authenticity of the crown if he hadn't been in the bath for 10000 years).
   The same is true of e-mail. I often see people discussing whether it is better to reply to e-mail immediately or later. My experience is that after receiving e-mail, you should read it as soon as possible, at least understand what is said in the e-mail. If you are not in a hurry, you can reply after thinking clearly.
2. Always think about what you are doing
   Generally speaking, the work we do always has a purpose and significance, but the form of work is very specific. When we are busy, we often get into a dead end, forget the real purpose and significance, and "can't think clearly" what we really want to do. A few days ago, I needed to build a demonstration environment. I had two schemes a and B. scheme a was estimated to take half an hour, and scheme B was estimated to take an hour. So I chose scheme a, but after I started, I found that the server lacked a necessary component, so I struggled to add this component first, and then compiled the software I needed. I also found that there would be compilation errors in the 64 bit environment (I had only compiled on 32-bit machines before), After checking the Internet, I found that a patch was needed, so I went around looking for this patch... At this time, it has been used for more than an hour, and I don't know how many problems there will be below; It suddenly occurred to me that what I really wanted to do was to demonstrate the program. Although it was interesting to solve problems such as patching and finding software, it was actually a waste of time from the perspective of the task, so I decided to choose scheme B, and it was successfully solved in an hour.
   According to my observation, many technicians are keen to solve pure technical problems, which Weinberg calls "hacking"; Wandering is fun and addictive, but we are not gods who don't eat human fireworks. If we want to really do something, we can't let wandering go.
   On this one, I want to add one more point: even if you are busy in the dark, you can't lose your head. It is common for people to work under great pressure and get too busy. Many people lose their direction in this kind of busy. They are often busy all day and don't know what they have done today and what the meaning is after work. My experience is that the more this kind of time, the more you need to cheer up and think (although it's difficult): what exactly do you want to do, and whether the current arrangement can be adjusted... Continuous thinking will produce feelings and make a difference, otherwise, you may always fall into the situation of "fooling around" and can't extricate yourself.
3. Set a clear time point for yourself
   I admit that I also like playing. It's really interesting to go to twitter, watch forums and chat when I'm free. The information is constantly updated, and something I'm interested in always pops up. But in this way, a lot of time is wasted in front of the computer, and I don't do anything meaningful. Even if I do it, the efficiency is very low - concentration can ensure efficiency. After exploring and reflecting, I think it is more appropriate to set a clear time point for myself: for example, now at 8:20, I can tell myself to play online for 20 minutes and start learning English at 8:40. Because I have a clear time limit, I will want to read all the contents I am interested in as efficiently as possible within these 20 minutes, instead of slowly "browsing"; At the set time point, we must obey orders and prohibitions, and concentrate on what we have decided before.
   More importantly, setting a clear time point for yourself from small things is very good for cultivating executive ability - if many small things can be "done as you say", slowly, complex and larger tasks can also be "done as you say", with inertia and confidence.
   4、. keep a diary
   A more formal website has a detailed access log (record). Even without data mining, once there is an abnormal fluctuation in the website access, it will be reflected in the log, and the problem can be found by checking the log; Websites are like this, so are people. I began to keep a diary every day since I translated Weinberg's "the road to technical leadership" in 2008. I found that the diary has the same function as the access log of the website: for example, I usually arrive at the company at about 8:35, with an error of no more than 5 minutes. But I checked my diary at about 9:00 a few days last week, and I can find out this change, and the reason for the change - the order of doing things in the morning has changed. Moreover, according to my diary, I can also observe and evaluate the impact of this change, whether it is good or bad.
   Diary can also constantly remind and urge myself. For a period of time, I found myself often in a state of having nothing to do. If I didn't have a diary, I mostly felt that "I always had nothing to do during this period", but the diary would write "today is the eighth day I feel I have nothing to do". In this way, the pressure on myself would be much greater and the motivation would be much stronger.
   I need to say more about diaries. I never understood why diaries are so simple for people who have kept diaries for many years? Only record what you did on that day, with a little simple comment, but not too much Lyric. I have kept a diary for more than a year since I translated the road to technical leadership. I gradually understand that continuous diary needs to record the main behaviors of the day, plus a little comment and reflection. Diary is not suitable as a carrier of lyricism. Its more suitable function is to truly record the traces of life for analysis and reflection, and then it is possible to improve itself.
4. Cultivate foresight
   The old saying "everything is established in advance, and abandoned without advance" is quite right. Take software projects for example. Although it is difficult to predict the development time of the project, experienced technicians can often make more accurate judgments. This is because they have the ability to foresee the problems that will be encountered in the development. In this way, the arrangement is more abundant in time (which can ensure efficiency) and more prepared psychologically.
   On the other hand, I have seen with my own eyes that many technicians, who just complete the task at this stage at hand, will be fine. They never foresee these problems: how much scale and pressure their programs can load, what problems will occur beyond this load capacity, how to solve them, and how long will this problem occur at the current development rate... The result is that when the problem really occurs, In a hurry, "iterative development" has become "demolition development" -- at a certain point in time, it will be torn down and start over again. The quality can't be guaranteed. If you don't say it, you're too tired to speak of it.
   There is a famous book in the software industry called refactoring. The core idea of this book is that software needs to be refactored constantly, or it will become rigid. If it is only satisfied that there is no problem at present, there is no way to talk about continuous refactoring.
5. Establish an overall view
   A friend discussed job hopping with me the other day. Now there are two choices, which are difficult to decide; After listening to his detailed description, I said, well, you don't look at salary and position for the time being. You think like this: what kind of person and life state do you want to be in ten or five years? Take this answer to measure your current two choices and see what happens. As a result, he made a happy decision later. I think this is the role of the overall view.
   I will also encounter many trade-offs and choices. For example, I always feel that my foundation on computer is not solid enough, my English is not good enough, I read too few books, and my photos are not good enough... So I want to go to cram school foundation, learn English, read books, and see the photos of masters... Doing any of them will give people a sense of achievement, but people's time and energy are limited, and it is impossible to give consideration to both; In many times when I need to make a choice, I will try to get rid of the limitations of a book, a knowledge, and a thing, jump out and think about what kind of state I am in, what is the important task, and what kind of person I want to be in the future... Only when I know the most urgent needs can I make a leisurely choice, even if I give up some good opportunities - besides, as teacher Li Xiaolai said, Temptations often appear disguised as opportunities. With the magic mirror of the overall situation, many temptations will show their true shape.
   The overall view is useful not only for personal growth, but also for work: no matter how small and trivial the things at hand, thinking can always jump out of the limitations of work and try to look at what you do from a broader perspective, what is the value of what you do and how to improve it; In this way, I can do my work better and cooperate with my colleagues more tacitly.
6. Observe carefully in life
   I go shopping at Metro every weekend. In the first few weeks, I choose different time points: 8 a.m., 11 a.m., 1 p.m., 4 p.m.. In this way, I can roughly know when shopping is the most time-saving. It is difficult to judge this accurately just by thinking, because there may be more checkout windows when there are many people, and fewer checkout windows when there are few people. With this understanding, we can make proper arrangements to minimize the time in line when shopping. In addition, you can also know the situation of the parking lot at different times. In rainy days, you can also choose the appropriate time to go shopping and park the car in a sheltered parking space.
   For another example, there is more than one road from home to the company. At the beginning, I will try every road to see whether it is congested, flat, and how long it will take; In this way, you can quickly choose the most appropriate path in various situations; If you only go one way or don't pay attention to observation, you won't understand these situations, and you won't have so many choices when you encounter situations.
7. Cultivate a sense of discretion
   In addition to qualitative analysis, quantitative analysis is also useful, and quantitative analysis is often more meaningful - there are too few problems of either this or that, black or white in the world. Unfortunately, many times we unconsciously look at the world with qualitative thinking, and often lose a lot of opportunities.
   For example, a biography "strange life" is mentioned in "taking time as a friend". The author describes in detail the practice of Soviet scientist lyubyshev in managing time - lyubyshev's grasp of time every day can be accurate to minutes, and he carefully records how much time he spends doing every day: Writing for 35 minutes, reading for 50 minutes... Although "accurate as a clock", the biographer also admits, The life that he thought was "still full" was really much worse than that of lyubichev. I feel deeply about reading "strange life", and I also know that although I can't be as precise as Liu bishev, I can at least learn some tricks secretly to make my life more organized and efficient. But when I recommended it to some friends, my first reaction was: life is so precise that it has become a robot. How terrible! The subtext is that I don't want to understand at all. But what I want to say is that a serious understanding of lyubichev's life does not require us to be as extreme as he is, but only to provide an opportunity to learn from other people's experience and living habits (if we don't know, we can't even learn from them). As for the degree of learning, this measure can and needs to be grasped by ourselves.
   I deeply believe that a sense of discretion is very important. It allows us to look at all situations calmly: when we see bad things, remind ourselves to keep a distance, when we see good things, tell ourselves to try to learn from them, at least not to be widened. Only in this way can we face life calmly and find our own coordinates. In the words of Karl Popper, the scientific philosopher I like, our good self-feeling must be based on comparison and judgment - the more we understand the world, the more we see, the more we know (of course, the more we grasp, the more we exercise self-restraint), the more "good" this feeling really is (the "good" that closes the door and stays self-contained is actually very fragile and gloomy). The philosopher Wittgenstein said before his death, "how happy I am, I have spent a good life.". He said that sentence with confidence.

title: What are the main factors that make people great
body:
History will only remember those who really push the wheel of history forward, and the people will only remember those who are dedicated to the happiness of the people forever. Only those who always think of the people, the people will always think of him. Nobility lies in selflessness, and greatness lies in dedication—— Great men are those who wholeheartedly seek the welfare of the people, make great contributions to human society, and promote the wheel of history. People love to read biographies of great people in order to know the main factors that make people great. So, what are they?
\[particularly noble moral character\] a person's moral character determines his life purpose, life ideal, life attitude, that is to say, determines a person's outlook on life. Outlook on life refers to the fundamental views and attitudes of people living in certain social conditions and environments on the purpose, value and significance of life based on a certain worldview and practical experience of social life. Why are you alive? What kind of person do you want to be? How can life be meaningful? What kind of life is a happy life? These questions are about the outlook on life. The outlook on life of people with particularly noble morality must be like this - people live to work hard for the people and make more contributions to human society. Only in this way can they live the most meaningful and happy life.
The building should be high, the foundation should be deep, and the person should be strong and virtuous. Great men must have great virtue first. What great people do is not something that ordinary people can't do, but often unwilling to do, or not unable to do for a while, but unwilling to do for a long time. For example, what Lei Feng did is not an earth shattering event, but a trivial matter. It can be said that each of us can do those things, but most of us are unwilling to do them, or we are only willing to do them for a while, rather than doing them from time to time, every day, every month, and every year, and keep doing them. This shows that greatness does not depend on ability, but mainly on morality. If a person has a great ability, if this great ability is only used to "do no harm to people and specialize in himself", then, let alone not be a great man, it is not worthy to be an ordinary person, and even because of "the opposite", it will become a big cancer that endangers society.
It can be seen from the above discussion that only people with particularly noble morality will selflessly give their lives to the people and devote themselves to human society; Only those who are especially noble in morality can make great contributions to human society. The famous saying "a master must be a man of great virtue" is a brief explanation of the importance of morality in the cause of great men. Having a particularly noble moral character is the most important quality of a great man, and it is also the most important factor for a great man to become a great man.
\[particularly noble ideal\] ideal refers to people's outlook and yearning for the future. It is the imagination and ambition that may be realized and related to the goal of life. Ideal is the flag of life; Ideal is the beacon of life; Ideal is the source of life strength.
Lofty ideals are decisive for a person to follow the right path of life and make great achievements. 1、 Because only by setting up lofty ideals, can we have a broad mind, not frown over trivial things in life, and not pursue fame and wealth endlessly. 2、 Because only those who have set lofty ideals and clear goals can have great spiritual motivation. With such motivation, they will have indomitable perseverance and iron will. No matter how tortuous the road is and how hard life is, they will not lose their way forward. Even under extremely difficult conditions, they are still full of vigorous fighting spirit and indomitable optimism, and do not shrink back even in the face of death threats.
A great man must have great ambition first. Many great men set up particularly noble ideals in their youth. Marx set up the great ideal of "seeking the welfare of all mankind" in his youth; Madame Curie set up the great ideal of "fighting for the prosperity and strength of the motherland" in her youth; Mao Zedong set up the great ideal of "transforming China and the world" in his youth; Zhou Enlai set up the great ideal of "fighting for the rise of China" when he was studying in Nankai Middle School; Li Dazhao set up the great ideal of "determined to work hard for the cause of national liberation" in his youth.
\[particularly firm belief\] belief, everyone has it, and different people have different beliefs,; Different beliefs will bring different lives. Faith refers to a psychological tendency that people extremely respect and believe in certain things, thoughts and doctrines, and regard them as the norms and guidelines for all their words and deeds, and even believe in them all their lives and pursue them persistently.
Firm faith is very important to life. It is the spiritual pillar of life: first, it can make people have sustenance and expectations. 2、 It gives people confidence, courage and perseverance, and affects people's mental state. 3、 It can guide people to establish lofty ideals and goals. 4、 It can become a powerful driving force for a person to set a lofty goal without fear of difficulties, hardships, and even bloodshed. If a person has a firm belief, he can be loyal, put aside his personal hardships, honors and disgraces, and put aside his life and death.
One of the reasons why great men are great is that they have a particularly firm belief. As martyr Fang Zhimin said, "the enemy can only cut off our heads and must not shake our faith! Because the doctrine we believe in is the truth of the universe." As Xia Minghan's martyrdom poem: "beheading doesn't matter, as long as the doctrine is true. Kill Xia Minghan, and later people."
\[strong sense of responsibility\] sense of responsibility is also called sense of responsibility. It is a positive emotion that a person wants to do well what he should undertake. What is the strict definition of responsibility? Responsibility is the responsibility and obligation of people to play different social roles in social survival and life. For example, in the family, parents have the responsibility to raise their children; In school, teachers have the responsibility of teaching and educating people; In society, citizens have the responsibility to promote social development; In the government, cadres have the responsibility of being good public servants of the people.
The responsibility of people is not to act if they want to, or not if they don't want to; It is not that if you want to do more, you will do more, and if you want to do less, you will do less. It should be done, it must be done. But the actual situation is really unsatisfactory. Many people have a weak sense of responsibility, or even a little sense of responsibility. For example, many children are not devoted to their parents; Many parents do not devote themselves to raising their children; Many students do not study hard; Many teachers do not devote themselves to teaching and educating people; Many citizens do not think about the development of society; Many cadres only think of their own interests.
One of the great reasons for great men is that they have a strong sense of responsibility, a strong sense of mission of the times and a strong sense of social responsibility. They not only did their duty well, but also did many extra duties. They care about the earth, mankind, the country and the people, and devote their lives and even lives to social progress, national prosperity and human civilization.
\[particularly high enthusiasm\] enthusiasm is a strong, stable and deep emotional state. Enthusiasm is always associated with people's clear understanding and firm will. It affects people's whole body and mind, determines the basic direction of people's behavior, becomes a huge force to promote and encourage action, and is a necessary condition for the success of all undertakings.
One of the common characteristics of all great revolutionaries, scientists and artists is that they have a high degree of enthusiasm for the cause they are engaged in. It is this enthusiasm that encourages them to make outstanding contributions to mankind. For example, Dalton, the great chemist and father of chemistry, Newton, the great physicist and father of physics, Nobel, the great inventor and chemist, have no enthusiasm for love, which is "more expensive" than life, because of their extreme enthusiasm for science. They do not marry all their lives and are passionate about the cause of science. Another example is Edison's bridal chamber, where he did experiments after his wedding and left his wife to spend the night alone; Pavlov made an appointment with his fiancee for the holiday, but he didn't leave the laboratory until the clock struck twelve at night. From their "ruthlessness" towards their lovers, we can see how enthusiastic they are about the scientific research they are engaged in.
Look at these famous words: Emerson said: the great deeds handed down in the world are the fruits of victory due to the enthusiasm of great men. Goethe said: the first and last thing that genius requires is the love of truth. Gorky said: Genius is developed due to the love of career. It can be said that genius is essentially just the love of career and work process. Disraeli said: every genius must be the product of enthusiasm—— How important passion is to be a great person!
\[particularly strong self-confidence\] Zhuang Zi said: sorrow is no greater than death. Cheng Yi said: the biggest sin is to abandon oneself. Lu Jiuyuan said: life must be self respecting. Bacon said: despair begets disappointment, disappointment shakes vividly, and vacillation begets failure. Montaigne said: the most barbaric thing is to despise yourself. Hugo said: I would rather rely on my own strength to open up my future than seek the favor of the powerful; You should believe that you are the winner of life. From these famous sayings about self-confidence at all times and in all countries, we can see how important self-confidence is to people's success!
Self confidence makes people strong. Self confidence is the primary psychological quality that any person who does great things must have, and it is the decisive factor of a person's achievement. Only when you are firmly confident in the cause you are engaged in, will you have perseverance and perseverance, will you have the courage and determination to overcome all difficulties, and will you lose and fight repeatedly until you succeed.
Self confidence makes people diligent. It is said that genius comes from diligence, while I say that genius comes from self-confidence. Because self-confidence is the premise of diligence, and only very confident people will be diligent. Will those who think they can't do anything well and succeed work hard?
Self confidence makes people innovative. A great person has an obvious characteristic that he is bold to be first, has a strong sense of innovation and a great spirit of innovation. They have made great original contributions because of this spirit. However, strong innovation consciousness and great innovation spirit are based on strong self-confidence. Otherwise, they will be superstitious about others, despise themselves, and dare not adhere to the correct truth understanding and invention they initiated.
Confidence makes people brave. Many people's lives are mediocre, often not incompetent, but fearless. Therefore, being fearless is because you are suspicious of your spirit, heart, knowledge, ability and so on, so you are afraid of wolves before and tigers after, content with the status quo, muddle along, and don't want to make progress.
According to the above analysis, one of the reasons why great people are great is that they have extraordinary self-confidence. People who achieve great things can be mediocre in intelligence, but their self-confidence must be extraordinary.
\[great man and Superman\] greatness lies in surpassing the thoughts, emotions, wills, ideals, interests, abilities and morality of ordinary people... Death is a hero, and transcendence is a hero. Only by being extraordinary can we become Superman. Similarly, great people are great because they are far beyond ordinary people in many aspects, especially in spiritual and psychological aspects: they can think of things that ordinary people can't think of; Can see what ordinary people can't see; Can hear what ordinary people can't hear; Can say what ordinary people can't say; Can do what ordinary people cannot do Of course, what we are talking about here is "positive transcendence", that is, transcendence in the direction beneficial to society.
\[great man and genius\] genius lies not in the quality of life, but in the quality of the day after tomorrow. Everyone can become a genius, and everyone can also become a mediocre, which mainly depends on whether he has good psychological quality. Genius is the great change and optimization of the day after tomorrow. Interest creates success, love creates genius. Most people are ordinary in appearance, and whoever is beautiful is an immortal; Most people have the same intelligence. Whoever works hard is a genius. He who exalts himself becomes a genius, and he who exalts himself becomes a fool.
Genius is not necessarily a great man, because genius mainly refers to the excellence of ability. Only those geniuses with excellent virtue and talent can be called great men.
There are many other factors that make people great, such as superhuman ability, superhuman perseverance, superhuman courage, super enterprising spirit and so on. However, they are not decisive factors, because their production and intensity are not only determined by the above-mentioned factors, but also by the direction and purpose of their role. Therefore, those major factors are the decisive factors and the main factors that make people great. Because those major factors are human spirit, we can briefly say that human greatness lies in the greatness of spirit.
If you are in line with ordinary people, you can only be ordinary people; Only by keeping up with great people can we become great people. Great people don't become great people in order to become great people. On the contrary, they just become great people in order to become "candles that burn themselves, let out light and heat". Great people are great mainly because of the greatness of spirit. May we all learn the great spirit of great men!

title: Don't go today, don't run tomorrow
body:
Now many people are advocating a little progress every day. Indeed, in the current era of accelerating pace of life, if you don't make progress today, tomorrow you will redouble your efforts for today's retrogression.
We all say that learning is like sailing against the current. If you don't advance, you will fall back. This requires you to make gains and progress every day. Even if the progress is small, as long as you move forward, you will get a result. Because every moment, others are running forward. If you stop, you will be far behind by others. At that time, even if you try your best to catch up, I'm afraid it won't help.
It's not difficult to make progress in what you have today. As long as you are willing to devote a little time to enrich yourself every day, even if it's only an hour, your achievements will be amazing. However, in today's era of accelerated pace of life, it seems that people don't have enough time to finish what they want to do every day, so many good ideas can't be implemented. However, there are still many people who insist on squeezing out at least an hour every day to improve themselves, and finally have made great achievements.
At Harvard, professors often remind students to do a good job in time management, and cite the following examples:
Glauford, President of DuPont, the world's largest chemical company? Greenwatt, squeeze out an hour every day to study hummingbirds and take photos of hummingbirds with special equipment. Authorities call his book on hummingbirds an outstanding work in the natural history series.
Hugh? Black had no higher education before entering the US Congress. From his busy schedule, he squeezed out an hour every day to the library of Congress to read widely, including books on politics, history, philosophy, poetry and other aspects. For several years, even in the busiest days of parliamentary work, he never stopped. Later, he became a judge of the Supreme Court of the United States. At this time, he was one of the most knowledgeable people in the Supreme Court.
A Greek elevator repairman named Nikola is very interested in modern science. He always spends an hour studying nuclear physics after work and before dinner every day. As the accumulation of knowledge increased, an idea jumped into his mind. In 1948, he proposed a plan to build a new type of particle accelerator. This kind of accelerator was cheaper and more powerful than other types of accelerators at that time. He submitted the plan to the U.S. Atomic Energy Commission for testing, and after further improvement, the accelerator saved the United States $70million. Nicholas received a $10000 reward and was hired to work in the Radiation Laboratory of the University of California.
At Harvard, students have such a consensus that every day they make little progress, which can not only give full play to their internal potential, but also accumulate capital for success. Indeed, if you don't work hard and always stand still, you won't achieve much in your life. Even if you are gifted, you will end up just a mediocre and do nothing. Harvard professors pay more attention to their continuous progress. Some Harvard professors have won the Nobel Prize, but they still study and work tirelessly. Some professors are over seventy years old and still insist on doing research in the laboratory. As a growing young person, there is no reason to stop yourself. I once saw such a story, which is very enlightening. Now let me share it with you.
John and Tom are children of two neighboring families. They have been playing together since childhood. John is a smart boy. He can learn everything at a glance. He knows his advantages and is very proud of himself. Tom's brain is not as clever as John's. although he studies hard, he can't get ahead in grades. Therefore, compared with John, his heart often shows an inferiority complex.
However, his mother always encouraged him: "if you always measure yourself by the achievements of others, you will only be a 'chaser' all your life. Although the galloping horse always roars ahead at the beginning, it is often the camel full of patience and perseverance that finally arrives at the destination."
In this way, John no longer feels inferior for his shortcomings, but tries to make continuous progress.
But the smart John thinks he is a smart man and never wants to make progress. Therefore, his performance in his life was mediocre, and he failed to achieve any major event. But Tom, who felt very stupid, enriched himself in all aspects, surpassed himself a little bit, and finally achieved extraordinary achievements.
John was so angry that he ended up depressed. After his soul flew to heaven, he asked God, "my intelligence is far better than Tom. I should be greater than him, but why did you make him an outstanding person on earth?" God smiled and said: "Poor John, you didn't understand until you died: when I sent everyone to the world, I put the same thing in the 'girdle' of his life, but I put your intelligence in front of the 'girdle'. You were so happy because you saw or touched your intelligence that you missed your life. But Tom's intelligence was behind the 'girdle'. Because he couldn't see his intelligence, he was always looking up In front of him, so he has been unconsciously moving forward all his life! "
In fact, it is true that on the road of life, you stop, but someone is rushing desperately. Maybe when you stand, he is still chasing after you, but when you look back, you can't see his figure, because he has run in front of you, and now you need to catch up with him. Therefore, you can't stop. You have to keep moving forward and surpassing. The result of this is to make continuous progress and finally achieve the other side of victory.
People who invest in the future are loyal to reality.
——Invest for future and be loyal to reality.
"Investment" is a very popular word at present. Everything you have in the future needs today's investment. As long as you have a little vision, you will think of investing for your tomorrow.
As a world-renowned university, Harvard emphasizes the need to have a long-term vision and invest in the future. Summers, the 27th president of Harvard, believes that the reason why Harvard can achieve today's results is inseparable from its long-term educational vision. It not only attaches importance to the current popular and popular disciplines, but also pays attention to the future development trend and prospects of a discipline. It is based on this idea that they put forward such a statement: people who invest in the future are loyal to reality.
We say that people should be loyal to reality, but those who are loyal to reality should have a long-term vision, because the reality is constantly developing, we should not only focus on the gains and losses of immediate interests, but also focus on the future and carefully plan for future development. Only in this way can we calmly welcome the future.
Before August, 1995, domain names were registered free of charge. In that year, Tim Lee registered a domain name cool dot com for himself. At that time, he was a fourth grader at the University of Washington.
This practice was laughed at by friends, who didn't understand the use of Tim for a domain name. At that time, Tim just wanted to earn enough money to pay tuition and rent. He almost sold it for less than 10000 dollars.
By 1996, Tim received an average of two calls a week to buy the domain name cool dot com, including an airline. But he didn't promise anyone. Finally, through a lawyer in New York, Tim transferred the domain name cool dot com to a famous consumer goods manufacturer with $3million in cash.
At that time, many people laughed at the company: seven letters plus a dot and eight symbols. It's crazy to spend so much money. But later, the company raised the price of this domain name to $38million

title: It's better to concentrate on one's skill than to be confused
body:
At present, many young people are confused - some are confused about college education: they feel that what they have learned is useless, "Newton equation" can not bring jobs and houses; There is confusion about social morality: avoiding loftiness and doubting tradition, while longing for a good moral trend in society; There is confusion about love: very eager for love, but unable to deal with love problems; There is confusion about the future: the lack of faith and the pressure of entrepreneurship and employment make many young people confused about the future. This confusion has something to do with China, which is in economic adolescence, and the era background of rapid growth and emotional fluctuations.
How can young people get out of this confusion and find their spiritual belonging? Strengthening skills may be a way out, that is, like a laser, focus on one point, focus on things and things, and practice repeatedly. There are many kinds of skills: production, marketing, service, administration, finance, research and development, art... Each professional post corresponds to a professional skill, but only the skills that can compete with people in the market are "effective skills".
Skills are also an important link, through which you can make friends with relevant majors, have a common language, and can improve each other. Friends with good mental state and positive energy will bring happiness and inspiration to themselves.
Only by strengthening skills can we be happy. When you devote yourself to studying a skill, you will have a direction in your heart and a place for your energy. Concentration makes you quiet and down-to-earth. The improvement of skills is also accompanied by the joy of growth and inner happiness. The spiritual outlook will be completely different after the great increase of passion and energy.
To strengthen your skills, you need to focus. The popularity of iPad and iPhone stems from its distinctive appearance, humanized operation, multi touch technology, etc. behind it is the perfection of every skill, the ultimate pursuit of consumer experience, and the perfect crystallization of highly focused skills.
Of course, to strengthen your skills, you need to constantly learn relevant books, make relevant friends, and strengthen your majors and preferences.
College students who have just started working often pay attention to the "big things" considered by leaders and even superiors, and are unwilling to do small things and go deep into them. My suggestion is to do big things like lifting heavy weights, small things like walking on thin ice, and to do one line of work, love one line of work, and concentrate on one line of work.
At present, many people in the society are not working for skill improvement, but just for making money. This is actually because the sense of professional honor is weakening and utilitarian thoughts are growing, which will eventually lead to spiritual desolation and spiritual emptiness, and from the most practical point of view, making less money. It is imperative to strengthen the sense of professional honor. Only by strengthening skills can young people find spiritual belonging. Only those who regard work as art and creation can realize the release of potential and finally achieve themselves.
In fact, the confusion of youth is not unique to China. In the era of rapid economic development and rapid cultural change, the youth of many countries have encountered this confusion. For example, the European and American youth in the 1960s have also been collectively confused and explored - where is the spiritual destination? Hippies, sexual liberation and other movements were once a solution, but in the end they didn't work.
However, a generation of young people represented by Germany and Switzerland finally walked out of confusion. The method is very simple, that is, concentrate on studying a skill, be meticulous, keep improving, and pursue the perfection and perfection of the skill. Even a small workshop is exquisite; Even a family inherited brand pursues refinement and personalization.
The value of strengthening skills is a sense of professional honor. In a good society, as long as you do your job almost perfectly, you will be fully respected, and you can experience professional honor and happiness. Pursuing the best skills can not only pursue your spirit, but also create value and contribute to the society. While meeting material needs, it can change impetuousness and shortsightedness. After the skills of the whole people are improved, they must improve their ability to innovate and promote change and invention.

title: Make good use of prime time: the first hour of every day
body:
In primary and junior high schools in the United States, there will be a place called the home room, where students must call the roll or listen to the notice before class every day. So students will have a period of time at the beginning of each day to think about their schedule, catch up with friends, or knock out a few tasks. Many successful people will arrange a home room time at the beginning of each day in their own schedule.
For Craig Newmark of Craigslist, David Karp of Tumblr, Tony Robbins, a master speaker, and brain Tracy, a professional writer, the first hour of each day may be a little different. Here is the first item on their daily task list:

1. Don't check your email in the first hour of every day. Don't
   Tumblr founder David Karp will try not to check his email in the morning, and will continue his efforts until 9:30 or 10 o'clock. In an interview with Inc, he said, "reading email at home never feels good or efficient. If something needs my immediate attention, someone will call or text me."
   Most of us don't need a sense of readiness to constantly exchange emails for an organization or a job. As Julie Morgenstern's book "never check email in the morning" says, this is a good strategy. Even in the busiest time, you can use this time to do at least one practical thing.
   If you need to make sure you don't miss some of the most important messages from some people, you can use awayfind to monitor your inbox and remind you when something worth noting comes into the box. This will be a gradual but meaningful process, which can train uninvited people who don't send letters to you during your office hours and colleagues who don't expect to receive your reply immediately in the morning.
2. Harvest consciousness and learn to be grateful
   There was a question on quora, "how do the most successful people start their day every day?". The most popular answer to this question comes from a fan of Tony Robbins, who talks about the first hour attention ceremony advocated by Tony Robbins.
   Robbins suggests setting a "energy hour", "30 minutes about growth" or at least "15 minutes about realization". This includes light exercise and motivational spells, but the best part is to spend ten minutes thinking about you, your family and friends, and what you need to be grateful for in your career, and then imagine what your life will be like if you already have everything you want in your life.
3. Do the heaviest thing first
   Brian Tracy's most classic time management book, "eat that frog", comes from Mark Twain: "if you swallow a frog raw first thing in the morning, you will forget the worst thing in the rest of the time, and nothing will get worse." Gina Trapani once explained in the "smart work" series of videos that here, the worst thing means the most important. Combined with the concept of "do one thing before reading email", you will get your own daily system. You need to stick to the method: choose your frog.
   Tripani suggested, "choose your frog, write it down with a piece of paper, and then you will see it when you return to your desk in the morning. If you can, put the materials you need to do things on the desk."
   The advantage of dealing with terrible and important things as the first thing in the morning is that you will have room to do things away from other participants, away from those who will make things complicated and frustrating. Avoid their eyes. Terrible things can often be less complicated, and you will accomplish more for it.
4. Ask yourself if you are doing what you want to do
   The feeling of not being satisfied with your work should not be something you should realize after months or even years. Consider making a serious attempt every morning as Jobs said:
   When I was 17 years old, I read a similar motto: "if you live every day like you did on the last day of your life, then one day you will find yourself right." This sentence impressed me deeply. Since then, for the past 33 years, I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself, "If today is the last day of my life, will I want to do what I need to do today?" And when the answer has been "no" for many days, I know it's time for me to change something.
5. Do "customer service" or similar humanized things
   Craig Newmark, the founder of craiglist, was very concise when he answered what he did in his first hour: "customer service." He explained that he was participating in a project to serve military families and veterans and protect the right to vote. And customer service is also what Newmark does every day on Craigslist. He responded to users' complaints and hit swindlers and spammers hard. In fact, he has more important things to do every day, but Newmark said that customer service "let me stop in reality".
   Back to us, "customer service" may be to keep in touch with previous project contacts, check in with your less interactive colleagues, ask mentor questions, or just deal with humanized work that will quickly disappear between task lists. Take such "customer service" as your daily work, and you will have a more reliable help list when you need it.

title: 《传统游戏链改》 （AMA 34）
body:
# 一 活动信息

Topic：《**传统游戏链改**》

Guest：毛刷总、Ethan

【嘉宾推特】

毛刷总  @msonline110
Ethan  @EthanMeta

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s2V4JoZgDOdzquz-g0SsM.png?height=1000&width=1000)

# 二 分享要点

## 1）链改能解决什么问题

**毛刷总  @msonline110**

区块链的技术，能够解决虚拟资产的唯一性标识，从而帮虚拟资产的确权；
智能合约、defi的出现，让游戏人看到了更多的可能性
通过项目尝试，让游戏人看到了一种可能：重新设想，通过创造一个虚拟的世界和经济系统，让游戏世界和现实世界有机结合。
在这个过程中，我们还发现，区块链的人群具备一种强共识的特性。一旦用户接受你的共识，他会主动的去传播你的共识。

**Ethan  @EthanMeta**
在我们看来free to pay，其实并不是一种非常健康的游戏状态；包括手机游戏，很多时候是一种没有感情的嫖客思维，生病周期会越来越短。
反而是一些大型端游，更容易让用户建立价值情感链接。
当我们看到区块链世界到来之后，本质上是在虚拟世界建立一种经济循环。在这种世界体系中，区块链的价值，是让用户不在依托中心化或者项目方，而是建立一种去中心化的方式，去保护真正的虚拟经济价值。
web3解决来游戏团队融资问题，以一种公开透明的开发方式，进行持续投资。理想情况下，游戏生态建设会从策划为主，转变成和用户交流，充分采纳用户的意见。

## 2）链游究竟在赚什么钱

**毛刷总  @msonline110**
游戏能不能赚到钱并不是一个新问题。对于我们而言，游戏能够成为和电视电影一样，被大众所接受，是一种坚定的认知。
目前链游用户的诉求更多实在追求价值增长。容忍度相对很低。
相较于传统游戏，并没有那些角色在游戏价值体系的成长的过程，用户冲进来更多会盯着币价的增长。
用户应该是一个逐渐成熟的过程，当越来越多的用户进入到这个行业以后，大家对于价值的认知会逐渐产生转变。以后一定是，部分用户在游戏里追求变现，一部分用户追求游戏本身的体验和情感价值。通过追求多层次的游戏体验，达到一个良性的循环。

之前做传统项目，一般通过流量转化收入。未来这可能也会是区块链游戏一个重要的收入来源。
另一方面，其实币圈的融资及nft的售卖，是项目启动的一个重要资金来源。这可以看作是把所有游戏参与人当作LP。

**Ethan  @EthanMeta**
链游目前其实并没有很多价值用户，更多是一种透支结构，先进入赚后进人的钱，或者赚资本市场、代币的钱。这是非常不健康的。
我们理想的状态，会希望，能够有越来越多价值用户进入到这个市场，这部分用户认可游戏的价值，愿意为游戏付费。通过这部分用户，让游戏逐渐变成一种共享经济。
衍生一步，我们认为，链游经济可能会变成一种国家行为。或者说演变成一种元宇宙。这样链游赚的就应该是这个游戏里所有经济活动税收或者说是交易手续费产生的钱。
目前链游的进入门槛相对较高，随着技术进步，门槛降低之后，肯呢个会出现一批价值用户，为链游本身的游戏性或者价值付费，是我们比较期待的一种状态。

## 3）未来链游的发展方向

**毛刷总  @msonline110**

第一种可能：买单方的转变
nft等买单用户会从所有的玩家或者大的lp，转变为品牌商。品牌商一次性购买的全部的nft，作为品牌输出的途径。然后投放到游戏中，用户从游戏中得到nft可以变现也可以自留。
国内类型的像618活动，投放的数字藏品就有这种趋势。

第二种：几个大的web3的游戏相互打通，形成真正的游戏世界/元宇宙。未来不断有新的游戏项目，基于这个体系内产生或者衰亡。但是数字资产的价值本身得到来延续。

第三种：用户之间的数字资产进行转化、博弈。

我们现在对于元宇宙的期待更多是一种基于发展的想象，只有越来越多真实从业者投身其中，实现线上线下的集合体。这件事情需要时间的验证。

web2游戏中的10%的付费用户养活了90%的玩家，对于web2的用户最终会接受web3的虚拟用品的价值这一点是很确认的。现在的gamefi一定会有多种尝试形式，需要时间和勇于尝试的人给我们答案

**Ethan  @EthanMeta**

跟玩家一起共建一个世界，所有的游戏参与者都是投资人。在这个体系中，项目方能够撅起部分的利益。
所有的参与者都是这个体系的贡献者，同时也是这个体系的利益共享着。

# 三 自由讨论

**链改过程中遇到最大的问题是什么？**

**毛刷总  @msonline110**

是否应该用智能合约替代原有游戏的中心化服务器。这首先导致用户的体验性非常差，其次区块链的用户可以不游戏直接向合约发送指令直接和合约互动，导致逻辑的漏洞。

**什么样的项目会选择链改？如果是一款运营比较好的传统游戏，是否还会有链改的动力和必要？**

**毛刷总  @msonline110**
第一点：所有的游戏团队，都有一点理想主义。我们会倾向拥抱新技术、拥抱未来，关注那些短期内不一定能看到收益的事情。
像ai、vr、面部捕捉，等等，我们相信这些技术终将会运用到未来的游戏项目中。
第二点：游戏团队也会有破圈的需求，以传奇为例，它可能会把游戏中的某一点上链或者跟区块链做结合，进行一种新方向的尝试。
作为研发团队，我们一直纠结的点是：做一个理想中能看到未来的产品，还是做符合现在市场用户追求的产品。
目前的链游我不是特别看好，但是未来3a游戏或者结合一些vr或者其他新技术的游戏，一定会越来越多的涌现出来。最终会有一两款标杆出来，从而激活整个市场。

title: 他让ATM机狂吐钞票，一举成为全球最牛明星黑客之一，却离奇死亡
body:
不知道大家对巴纳拜·杰克这个人是否有所了解，热衷于IT的人群对他的了解可能会更深入，他是出生于新西兰的一名黑客，不仅如此也是程序员和计算机安全专家。

在世界上强大的黑客很多，为什么这个人就那么有名呢?因为巴纳拜曾经花了两年时间研究如何破解自动提款机，不仅如此，还将此成果在2010年7月28日美国拉斯维加斯举行的一年一度的“白帽”黑客会议上展现出来，当时他破解了程序的提款机不断的吐出钞票在地上堆成小山，后来这样精彩的好戏在“白帽”黑客会议上被称为“提款机破解秀”，也让他一举成名。

就跟任何一个黑帽子大会上厉害的黑客一样，杰克说，他的攻击是为了帮助他的目标客户获得一个长期的安全。他说，我不是为了发明本“烹饪教材书”教会大家怎么不断去攻击。“我的目标是让大家增强这种保护的意识。不是让每个孩子都出门，都开始耍弄ATM机。”

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/f_WEZHkcGGADjVAtaW4R6.png?height=710&width=1046)

在美剧《国土安全》中有一个利用远程操控心脏起博器杀人于千里之外的案件，当然所有人都认为是科幻的，毕竟在现实中怎么可能有这么神奇的事情，但是巴纳拜并不这样认为，他甚至在博客中发文表示这一情节距离现实并不遥远，还能在现实中再现情节。在自动取款机之后，他又开始研究医疗行业的相关漏洞。巴纳拜杰克通过对医疗器械心脏起搏器的研究，将自己的计算机侵入这一医疗设备，使得在九米以外的地方让起搏器发出830v的电压实现远程杀人。

这一黑客技术一出，便震惊了世界。并且巴纳拜杰克还表示，它可以侵入所有的起搏器制造商的服务器，将所有医疗设备都植入病毒，将远程遥控杀人变为现实。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-9dnDw3oxBbeKTcw-0SB9.png?height=671&width=1093)

时隔3年之后，巴纳拜杰克打算在7月31日开幕的“白帽”黑客会议上，展示一项更为惊人的“黑客绝技”：在9米之外入侵植入式心脏起搏器等无线医疗装置，然后向其发出一系列830V高压电击，从而令“遥控杀人”成为现实。杰克声称，他已经发现了多家厂商生产的心脏起搏器的安全漏洞。

杰克解释称，近几年生产的心脏起搏器一般都设有无线接收装置，以便可以在10米至15米范围内进行遥控调节，这正好给了黑客可乘之机。杰克发现，用无线输入特定命令之后，起搏器就会输出其序列号和型号，由此可以控制体内的起搏器。杰克开发了一款名为“电鳗”的程序，可以扫描一定范围内所有的心脏起搏器并入侵。杰克甚至认为，可以直接入侵生产商的软件服务器，将“后门程序”植入他们生产的所有起搏器，并使其像病毒一样传播开来。

但让人意想不到年仅35岁的巴纳拜杰克在家中突然地离奇死亡。然而蹊跷的是，7月25日，就在这项“黑客绝技”曝光前夕，杰克突然在美国旧金山神秘死亡。旧金山警方拒绝透露死因，只是宣布尸检需要一个月时间。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/u_n5xhELp1PxvJuEYT_KO.png?height=792&width=1272)

“这是一起意外。”旧金山验尸官办公室的发言人表示。杰克的死因是海洛因、可卡因、苯海拉明和阿普唑仑混合吸食过量。

并且直到现在巴纳拜杰克的死因都无从查证。一时之间在社会上引起了各种死亡的传说，认为其危害到了国家安全和大众利益。

一代天才英年早逝，如果他的研究成果改变方向用在正道上那将是多么好啊。

title: 易烊千玺考编引发全网争议，明星有必要和普通人争编制吗
body:
7月6日，国家话剧院公示2022年应届毕业生拟聘人员名单，中央戏剧学院2022届毕业生易烊千玺、罗一舟、胡先煦等在列。该名单一经披露便引发大量连锁争议：**国家话剧院面试过程究竟该不该公开？易烊千玺是否为非在职人员、能否开公司？**

许多网友提出疑问：

**面试过程究竟该不该公开？**

据人社部公示的国家话剧院2022年应届毕业生拟聘人员名单，共有10人进入公示名单，其中易烊千玺、罗一舟、胡先煦等8位均为中央戏剧学院应届毕业生，除了一名博士研究生应届生拟聘岗位为服装设计岗，其余七位均为演员岗。公示时间为7月7日至7月15日。

消息一出，便引发了极大的舆论关注，但争议也随之而来，其中，“免笔试”招考流程和面试过程究竟是否公开成为了话题焦点。

每经记者查询发现，根据2022年国家话剧院的招聘公告，演员岗位不参加笔试，通过资格审查的人员直接进入面试。面试分三次，每次面试总成绩为100分，60分及以上为合格，60分以下人员不再进入下一次面试环节。演员岗位以第三次面试成绩为最终成绩。所有岗位考生最终成绩80分（含80分）以上者为合格，如所有考生均未达到合格分数线，则取消该岗位聘用计划。

每经记者发现，2021年国家话剧院招聘公告中有“笔试”项，5个岗位分别为：文秘（党务）、出纳、舞台监督、音响操作、灯光操作，最终的公示名单中也并未出现“演员岗”拟聘人员。

针对上述争议，7月8日，中国国家话剧院工作人员回复正观新闻称，名单上人员尚处于公示阶段，并没有录取，一直在关注网络舆情，公示期出现异议的情况会向领导反映，向上级单位报批。

事实上，这并不是明星第一次考编制。明星考编由来已久，为何今日易烊千玺等人考编，却引发巨大争议呢？

恐怕还有更深层次的问题：**明星有必要和普通人争编制吗 ？在这个大内卷时代，编制是稀缺资源，考编的名额非常有限，考编通过后，相当于拿到了铁饭碗。在疫情和经济不景气的情况下，多少人为之拼命。**

明星们需要这东西吗？编制这东西除了让他们的履历好看一些、社会关系扩大一些之外，并没有太多用处。

可是，这些人偏偏要与普通人竞争。普通人用来养家活口。而大部分明星考编目的是在装点门面。

这公平吗？

除了这个问题，还有一个更深刻的问题：**明星得了编制，能从事相关工作吗**

这些明星获得编制的人，能按时上下班吗？显然是不可能的。

获得编制的人，是不是也应该有一个回避的问题？你不能从事与自己单位相关的私人业务。

有些事业编的明星呢？他们成天在外接戏、接商务活动、接代言，开工作室和公司，忙着自己的私事。有的甚至一个综艺就能拿到上千万的收入，可以说已经属于“享受特权的群体”了。却来和普通人竞争岗位，这编制内的工资和补贴也一分不少。这些钱对于他们而言只是“毛毛雨”，可有可无，可对普通人却是生存的根本。

事实上，娱乐圈很多老一辈演员都有编制，李雪健、唐国强，张国立，唐国强，张凯丽，吴刚，林永健，陈宝国，侯鸿亮，姜昆，濮存昕，冯巩，李金斗，孟广禄等人。

　 中生代演员有王景春，刘烨，杜江，刘涛，王雷，佟丽娅，沈腾，邓超，颜丙燕，宋佳，黄晓明，黄渤，陈建斌，吴京，靳东，张涵予等。

此前，这并未成为社会大众对明星考编不满的原因之一。然而2021年，郑爽在《倩女幽魂》剧组的阴阳合同被曝光，网友计算得出，她的日薪高达208万元，这也成为大众对明星好感度急转直下的转折点。

其后，邓伦、薇娅、袁冰妍等偷漏税事件频繁曝出，他们享有社会资源，却不约束自身、提升业务能力，力求做到德配其位，反而在法律边缘试探，不断挑战大众底线。普通民众对实力派演员还能有所包容，但对流量明星的容忍程度滑坡，导致对易烊千玺入编的事件出现较大反应。

现在的大学毕业生就业形势并不乐观，相比以前，大学生更倾向于稳定性高的工作。所以公务员和体制的关注度越来越高多，然而没想到的是一些明星考编制遭受非议，**如果是公平公正地考编相信大家是不会反感的，并且能在编制内做出贡献相信很多粉丝也会高兴的**。

title: 《传统游戏链改》 （AMA.34）
body:
# 一 活动信息

Topic：《**传统游戏链改**》

Guest：毛刷总、Ethan

【嘉宾推特】

毛刷总  @msonline110
Ethan  @EthanMeta

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s2V4JoZgDOdzquz-g0SsM.png?height=1000&width=1000)

# 二 分享要点

## 1）链改能解决什么问题

**毛刷总  @msonline110**

区块链的技术，能够解决虚拟资产的唯一性标识，从而帮虚拟资产的确权；
智能合约、defi的出现，让游戏人看到了更多的可能性
通过项目尝试，让游戏人看到了一种可能：重新设想，通过创造一个虚拟的世界和经济系统，让游戏世界和现实世界有机结合。
在这个过程中，我们还发现，区块链的人群具备一种强共识的特性。一旦用户接受你的共识，他会主动的去传播你的共识。

**Ethan  @EthanMeta**
在我们看来free to pay，其实并不是一种非常健康的游戏状态；包括手机游戏，很多时候是一种没有感情的嫖客思维，生病周期会越来越短。
反而是一些大型端游，更容易让用户建立价值情感链接。
当我们看到区块链世界到来之后，本质上是在虚拟世界建立一种经济循环。在这种世界体系中，区块链的价值，是让用户不在依托中心化或者项目方，而是建立一种去中心化的方式，去保护真正的虚拟经济价值。
web3解决来游戏团队融资问题，以一种公开透明的开发方式，进行持续投资。理想情况下，游戏生态建设会从策划为主，转变成和用户交流，充分采纳用户的意见。

## 2）链游究竟在赚什么钱

**毛刷总  @msonline110**
游戏能不能赚到钱并不是一个新问题。对于我们而言，游戏能够成为和电视电影一样，被大众所接受，是一种坚定的认知。
目前链游用户的诉求更多实在追求价值增长。容忍度相对很低。
相较于传统游戏，并没有那些角色在游戏价值体系的成长的过程，用户冲进来更多会盯着币价的增长。
用户应该是一个逐渐成熟的过程，当越来越多的用户进入到这个行业以后，大家对于价值的认知会逐渐产生转变。以后一定是，部分用户在游戏里追求变现，一部分用户追求游戏本身的体验和情感价值。通过追求多层次的游戏体验，达到一个良性的循环。

之前做传统项目，一般通过流量转化收入。未来这可能也会是区块链游戏一个重要的收入来源。
另一方面，其实币圈的融资及nft的售卖，是项目启动的一个重要资金来源。这可以看作是把所有游戏参与人当作LP。

**Ethan  @EthanMeta**
链游目前其实并没有很多价值用户，更多是一种透支结构，先进入赚后进人的钱，或者赚资本市场、代币的钱。这是非常不健康的。
我们理想的状态，会希望，能够有越来越多价值用户进入到这个市场，这部分用户认可游戏的价值，愿意为游戏付费。通过这部分用户，让游戏逐渐变成一种共享经济。
衍生一步，我们认为，链游经济可能会变成一种国家行为。或者说演变成一种元宇宙。这样链游赚的就应该是这个游戏里所有经济活动税收或者说是交易手续费产生的钱。
目前链游的进入门槛相对较高，随着技术进步，门槛降低之后，肯呢个会出现一批价值用户，为链游本身的游戏性或者价值付费，是我们比较期待的一种状态。

## 3）未来链游的发展方向

**毛刷总  @msonline110**

第一种可能：买单方的转变
nft等买单用户会从所有的玩家或者大的lp，转变为品牌商。品牌商一次性购买的全部的nft，作为品牌输出的途径。然后投放到游戏中，用户从游戏中得到nft可以变现也可以自留。
国内类型的像618活动，投放的数字藏品就有这种趋势。

第二种：几个大的web3的游戏相互打通，形成真正的游戏世界/元宇宙。未来不断有新的游戏项目，基于这个体系内产生或者衰亡。但是数字资产的价值本身得到来延续。

第三种：用户之间的数字资产进行转化、博弈。

我们现在对于元宇宙的期待更多是一种基于发展的想象，只有越来越多真实从业者投身其中，实现线上线下的集合体。这件事情需要时间的验证。

web2游戏中的10%的付费用户养活了90%的玩家，对于web2的用户最终会接受web3的虚拟用品的价值这一点是很确认的。现在的gamefi一定会有多种尝试形式，需要时间和勇于尝试的人给我们答案

**Ethan  @EthanMeta**

跟玩家一起共建一个世界，所有的游戏参与者都是投资人。在这个体系中，项目方能够撅起部分的利益。
所有的参与者都是这个体系的贡献者，同时也是这个体系的利益共享着。

# 三 自由讨论

**链改过程中遇到最大的问题是什么？**

**毛刷总  @msonline110**

是否应该用智能合约替代原有游戏的中心化服务器。这首先导致用户的体验性非常差，其次区块链的用户可以不游戏直接向合约发送指令直接和合约互动，导致逻辑的漏洞。

**什么样的项目会选择链改？如果是一款运营比较好的传统游戏，是否还会有链改的动力和必要？**

**毛刷总  @msonline110**
第一点：所有的游戏团队，都有一点理想主义。我们会倾向拥抱新技术、拥抱未来，关注那些短期内不一定能看到收益的事情。
像ai、vr、面部捕捉，等等，我们相信这些技术终将会运用到未来的游戏项目中。
第二点：游戏团队也会有破圈的需求，以传奇为例，它可能会把游戏中的某一点上链或者跟区块链做结合，进行一种新方向的尝试。
作为研发团队，我们一直纠结的点是：做一个理想中能看到未来的产品，还是做符合现在市场用户追求的产品。
目前的链游我不是特别看好，但是未来3a游戏或者结合一些vr或者其他新技术的游戏，一定会越来越多的涌现出来。最终会有一两款标杆出来，从而激活整个市场。

title: 项目2：MOONWELL：基于 Moonbeam 和 Moonriver 的借贷协议（20220709）
body:
### 1，项目简介

Moonwell 是一个基于 Moonbeam 和 Moonriver 的开放借贷 DeFi 协议。Moonbeam（GLMR）是 Polkadot 上第一个完全兼容以太坊虚拟机 (EVM) 的平行链。Moonriver（MOVR）是 Moonbeam 在 Kusama 上的姊妹网络。代币方面，Moonwell 采取双币制，分别是：MFAM（Moonriver 网络）以及 WELL（Moonbeam 网络）。

### 2，为什么在Moonbeam上开发？

Moonbeam 是 Polkadot 上第一个完全兼容以太坊虚拟机 (EVM) 的平行链，既具有 Polkadot 的可扩展性和互操作性，又兼具以太坊的易用性，对以太坊开发者社区更友好。并且，由于 Moonbeam 与 EVM 兼容，以太坊、Fantom 和其他 EVM 兼容链的用户将能够使用 MetaMask 等熟悉的工具与 Moonwell 进行交互。

### 3，项目优点：

* 团队：核心团队由几位前 Coinbase 和 Google 工程师组成，联合创始人 Luke Youngblood 是前 Coinbase 高级参谋工程师和 AWS 首席工程师；
* 融资：2022年3月完成 1000 万美元融资，估值为 9000 万美元；

title: 最恨的毒妇：韩国骗保大案比李恩海还残忍，连家人也不放过
body:
2019年韩国骗保大案：2019年6月30号，妻子李恩海找来了好友曹贤洙、李贤珠等4男3女去平龙沼溪谷游玩，当时尹相烨也陪同妻子过去，傍晚时有一对情侣先回到停车场，只剩下了3男2女在溪谷边玩水，李恩海让3名男士玩一次跳水，在陆续跳水之后，曹贤洙和李贤珠很快回来了，但尹相烨却不见了，找不到的情况下报警，最终捞到了尹相烨，他溺毙在溪谷中。

由于尹相烨身上无外力袭击的痕迹，被认定为意外溺水，几个月后妻子李恩海找保险公司索赔8亿的赔偿，但保险公司认为尹相烨的死亡时间，离到期只有4个小时，一切都太巧合了，李恩海为丈夫买了4份巨额意外保险，保险公司认为有骗保的可能，李恩海眼看拿不到8亿，非常不满，求助媒体给保险公司施压，上了SBS的电视节目《我想知道真相》上。没成想施压无果，反而让节目组也起了疑心，开始调查。他们在调查中发现，妻子和情人在死者死亡前的半年中，还有两次谋杀行为，只不过都以失败告终。这次在保单有效期的最后几个小时，终于成功了。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bQp3z-1XTaYlvUSKNtFmW.png?height=732&width=1184)

死者夫妻合照

由于这些调查结果太过严重，2021年2月开始，仁川地方检察厅接手该案件，开始对李恩海进行了调查，并寻找到李恩海和情人赵贤洙涉嫌谋杀的证据。2021年12月，李恩海和赵贤洙被传唤调查。结果两人销声匿迹、下落不明。二人失踪后，警方发布了通缉令，然后李恩海两任前男友意外身亡的事情也被曝光，第一任男友2010年在一场车祸中丧生，李恩海当时在车上，事发后她获得了保险公司的一笔赔偿，第二任男友2014年在泰国芭堤雅潜水时出了意外，李恩海当时描述的情况，其实与警方调查有出入，但当时死者家人收到了抚恤金，也没有过多追究，李恩海又一次收到了保险金的赔偿。

2022年4月16日逮捕两人并移交检察厅，至此，此案的真相在两人的落网后水落石出。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/E25mXpJrnxRjO2k7Ge-Bt.png?height=898&width=1280)

韩国骗保还有比李恩海还狠的人，她就是韩国最著名的“连环残杀亲人巨额骗保案”主角——严仁淑。

严仁淑于1976年出生在江南江原道的一个普通家庭，上有一个哥哥，下有一个弟弟。她长相甜美，是不折不扣的天然美人坯子，在整形大国来说自然是众多男生簇拥追慕的对象。从小严仁淑就是个问题少女，严仁淑高中时就因为偷同学的钱被强制转学。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/r_b4R3OLlf7kG-PMzFGRW.png?height=1092&width=1154)

父母对她很是溺爱，父母以为严仁淑长大就会好起来，事情却和他们想的不一样。她不仅偷同学的钱，还偷母亲的嫁妆偷偷卖掉，高中的时候她父亲去世了，全家都很悲痛，而严仁淑当时居然偷了父亲的银行卡，疯狂买奢侈品！她的物欲超出常人，为了钱什么都做得出来。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/j1KoZBbVf-AiGzn7zPVkL.png?height=642&width=1280)

21岁的严仁淑孤身一人来到了首尔，她在这里找到了一份保险设计师的工作。名字听起来高大上，实际就是卖保险。在这个岗位上，她将保险行业的规则吃得非常透彻。补充一点，在韩国保险理赔的金额的高低，最高的是死亡，然后是失明和烧伤，所以这3种方法也贯穿严仁淑作案的这个始终，就是弄瞎、烧伤最后杀死！

保险行业没让严仁淑成为业绩高手，反而成为她后来泯灭人性的犯罪的技术指导。没过多久，严仁淑认识了在搬家公司工作的26岁男子李某。李某长相英俊，严仁淑很快和他坠入爱河。尽管两家人都不看好这段婚姻，严仁淑还是和李某结婚了。

李某对严仁淑有求必应，一开始两人相处得不错，还生下了一个女儿。但是李某的工资微薄，即使把工资全部上交也无法满足自己对奢侈生活的向往和追求两个人开始了争吵。

2000年2月份，他们三岁的女儿从楼梯摔下意外身亡，严仁淑和丈夫悲惨万分。他们短暂地和好了，李某觉得亏欠严仁淑很多，对她千依百顺。

但女儿的死是严仁淑彻底释放了狠毒与残忍，她表面和丈夫相互安慰，实际已经开始设计她的害人计划。在无法磨灭的丧女之痛中，保险公司的一笔赔付却让严仁淑在黑暗中看到一条邪恶之路。

**打开地狱之门**

2000年3月，严仁淑凭借从前保险设计师的工作经验，一个月内为丈夫买了四份高额的保险，所有的保险受益人都写了严仁淑自己的名字。同时，严仁淑声称因为丧女得了抑郁症，需要定期去精神病院看医生，每次医生都会给她开一些抗抑郁药和安眠药。

2000年5月，严仁淑给丈夫喝下了掺杂抗抑郁症药物的饮料，她趁丈夫迷糊时将他一把推下楼梯。

李某因为脑震荡住院治疗三周，出院次月又被妻子推下楼梯伪装成意外事故，严仁淑以此骗取了高额保险金。

李某接连受伤后，原本不喜欢严仁淑的婆家难道不怀疑她吗？

婆家确实一点没有怀疑过严仁淑，原因是李某以前就患过精神疾病。现在李某受了伤，严仁淑不离不弃的照顾让李家人很感动，不仅不怀疑，还要接纳严仁淑。

然而推下楼梯只是开胃菜，同年5月严仁淑还不满足，给丈夫喂下安眠药后，她趁丈夫睡着扒开了李某的眼皮，用别针扎瞎了李某右眼。李某刚治疗完眼睛出院，严仁淑又故技重施把热油淋到了李某脸上。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nDlEGXiFBVVDqUlTvGRF4.png?height=752&width=1168)

严仁淑之所以选择这样折磨李某，是因为她知道眼球受伤和烧伤是仅次于死亡外保额最高的赔偿项目。

李某一连串的受伤引起了医院的怀疑，医生找到李家人，劝他们仔细问问。

李某家人询问严仁淑时底气很不足，他们不太愿意相信严仁淑会害自己的儿子，只是试探道：“仁淑啊，你能再跟我说说我儿子是怎么受伤的吗？”

重复谎言很难，严仁淑没有上当，她故作柔弱地说：“这些伤都是老公精神病发作弄的，具体过程我也不清楚。老公是因为生病了，他不是故意伤害自己的，你们要怪就怪我吧，是我没有看住他。”

尽管这次试探被严仁淑完美躲过，她也因此收敛了几个月。

2000年9月，严仁淑再也忍不住，她直接用刀捅了李某的肚子，对外依旧宣传这是丈夫精神病发作的自残行为导致的。次年1月和2月，严仁淑又捅了丈夫两次。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Kp-hg1ekjpNkexcF24oJx.png?height=570&width=1280)

接二连三的受伤，李某因为并发症死在了治疗精神病的医院里。

严仁淑计划周密，当时的保险社之间也没有同步数据，她利用第一任丈夫轻松骗取了2亿韩币，让严仁淑可以任意挥霍一段时间。

**再次寻找猎物**

2001年5月，严仁淑就在夜店找到了下一个目标，31岁的林某。

严仁淑的长相美丽大方，出手阔绰，林某认为自己捡到了宝，高兴得不行。为了尽快嫁给林某，严仁淑从6月就开始和林某同居。严仁淑这次没有用真实身份，她谎称自己是名牌大学毕业的幼儿园老师，家里还有10亿财产等着她继承。

严仁淑只有嫁给林某才能骗保，她开始对自己进行全方位的包装，曾一次性花3000多万韩币给男友送新车。

2002年11月，严仁淑照搬对第一任丈夫的手法，给林某悄悄喂下了精神类药物，林某直接摔倒导致尾骨骨折。

林某差点变成瘫痪，严仁淑却不离不弃，他同意了结婚，严仁淑迅速拿着两人的印章登记。

摔倒、瞎眼和烧伤，严仁淑正想靠着三件套对林某为所欲为。可惜林某身体不如李某，林某在2003年2月治疗途中就因为伤口恶化离世了，严仁淑只骗取了4000万保险金。

林某家人不能接受儿子英年早逝，他们提议对林某进行尸检，严仁淑害怕被识破，当时怀孕5个月的她提出要和丈夫举办一场灵魂婚礼。严仁淑举办了盛大的婚礼，过程中她对丈夫的“真情流露”打消了林某家人的怀疑。

不过孩子刚出生不久便夭折了。

残害林某的案子就这样被严仁淑瞒天过海，危机解除后就带着钱去肆意挥霍了。

来钱快，去得更快。在奢靡中将钱财挥霍一空的严仁淑开始了新的恶毒计划。

第二次婚姻让严仁淑想明白了一件事，要诈骗其他人的保险，她必须长期投入且和对方结婚，毕竟杀死自己的丈夫这种方式的确太慢了，那只要是家人，不就可以直接下手了吗？

结婚需要时间，还是家人方便，严仁淑开始计划骗取家人的保险。

2003年7月，严仁淑喂母亲喝下了加有安眠药的果汁，他贴心地对母亲说：“妈妈，这个可是最新的保健品哦，喝了补充营养。”

母亲毫无防备地喝下果汁陷入昏迷，她又拿起注射针扎进了母亲右眼。同年11月，严仁淑对哥哥故技重施，趁哥哥睡着往他右眼倒了盐酸。有了两次经验的她，为了避免怀疑提前买好的保险里没有直接把受益人写成自己，哥哥的受益人是母亲，母亲的受益人是哥哥。

母亲和哥哥半年内都变成了瞎子，哥哥起了怀疑，他问严仁淑：“你回到家后，家里人都受伤了啊。”

严仁淑不打算放过哥哥，她趁护士不在对哥哥的吊瓶动了手脚，想用哥哥的死诈骗更高的保险金额，但哥哥被及时抢救没有死。

现在两个人都需要严仁淑照顾，按理说是会主动保险给她的。母亲毫无怀疑地给了严仁淑全部保险金，哥哥却因为知道严仁淑过去就花钱大手大脚，不同意把保险金一次性给她。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Lzih4XPWWJdTu7E1dxuEw.png?height=524&width=722)

严仁淑为了保险金又在家里呆了一年多，然后她就发现保险金不够花了。严仁淑没有放弃利用家里人，这次她盯上了一家四口居住的房子。

当哥哥像往常一样质问严仁淑到底把钱花到哪里时，严仁淑抓住机会说：“哥，我没有乱花钱，我把钱都攒起来买首尔的房子了。”

哥哥疑惑道：“你的钱够买首尔的房子吗？”

严仁淑狡黠地笑了起来：“不够啊，所以我想把我们家的旧房子卖掉，一起去首尔住新房子。”

哥哥不是很相信严仁淑的话，母亲却说：“哎呀，我们严仁淑真是长大了，这么漂亮，还这么有孝心。”

母亲帮严仁淑抵押房子还了钱，严仁淑也承诺了入住时间。

随着时间越来越近，严仁淑眼看着就瞒不下去了。哥哥问她：“房子呢？”

严仁淑装傻答：“在首尔啊。”

哥哥仿佛看穿了严仁淑的算盘，他挖苦道：“是什么房子？空气房吧，看不见摸不着，哈哈哈哈哈哈。”

哥哥的嘲讽让严仁淑怒火中烧，她要一把火烧了这个家，这样问题就解决了。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XBkJ_GwuEMQoE2sFone5Q.png?height=726&width=1172)

严仁淑提前给全家下了安眠药，警觉的哥哥却提前醒过来扑灭了大火，他的手臂被烧伤，弟弟因为吸入太多烟尘造成呼吸道烧伤。。

严仁淑凭借火灾直接从保险公司骗到了2亿400万韩元，虽然骗到了钱，但严仁淑现在没有地方住了，她该去哪里落脚呢？

**善良的可怜人，带给全家灭顶之灾**

房子烧了后严仁淑无处可去，她找到了曾为自己工作过的保姆姜某。

姜某是个善良的人，要是其他人，她很愿意收留，可严仁淑已经拖欠了她好几个月工资了，她只能说：“我和老公孩子一家四口一起住，没有多余的房间了，实在怕委屈您啊。”

严仁淑摆出了一幅无助的样子，梨花带雨说：“我的家被烧了，我好害怕，好想你陪陪我。”

姜某也可怜严仁淑，她表情为难，一时拿不定主意。

严仁淑又承诺：“我只住一个月，离开时会还清拖欠的工资，还会给酬金。”

姜某让恶魔住进了家，但身价上亿的严仁淑住了好几个月都没有走，也丝毫没有要还工资的样子，每天对她颐指气使，还当她是下人。

姜某彻底生气了：“哎呦，从没有见过你这么抠的人，穿着名牌却连保姆的工资都付不起，该不会全是假货吧？”

姜某平时温温柔柔，严仁淑从来没想过会被她嘲讽，她态度软和了下来：“对不起，我明天就搬走，再给我一天时间收拾东西吧。”

姜某不是不讲情面的人，她同意严仁淑再住一晚，但是她不知道严仁淑因为她一句话已经起了杀心。

当天夜里，严仁淑将带火的毛巾扔到了姜家的沙发上，姜某的丈夫直接死亡，姜某的两个孩子也被严重烧伤。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/l-uaLOI1OCt1RDtVZzm8E.png?height=692&width=1280)

放完火后，严仁淑才想起来这场火灾不但不会给自己带来任何收益，而且还会被人怀疑。她怕还活着的姜某看出端倪，准备斩草除根，在医院应急通道倒上汽油准备纵火。

医院的监控拍到了严仁淑纵火过程，她当场被警察押回警察局审问。

回到警局后，严仁淑在警局拒不认罪，还不停做出奇怪的举动，声称女儿死后自己得了精神疾病，只要看到火花就忍不住纵火，她不是故意的。

警察当然不相信严仁淑的话，正准备先把她扣押起来，严仁淑却躺在地上口吐白沫，当场尿了出来。

严仁淑身高接近1米7，身材较好，皮肤白皙，五官精致，说话也很温柔。没有人看出，她和天使外表不同，有着最邪恶的内心。

警方也在一时之间被严仁淑的外表迷惑，虽然医生说严仁淑没有问题，但警方询问几句后还是放走了她。

严仁淑刚被放回去，她的亲弟弟却到了警局，他告诉警方姐姐身边的人都会不停受伤，有必要再好好调查一下姐姐。

不查不知道，一查吓一跳。五年时间里，严仁淑身边足足有8名因为相似原因死亡或受伤的人，累计领取保险金5亿6000万韩币，约330万人民币。

严仁淑被捕后，因为故意杀人罪等九项罪名被判处了无期徒刑，目前已经在清州女子监狱服刑。

严仁淑的计划不算高明，她最可怕的是让受害人家属感恩戴德，觉得她是忠贞不渝的好媳妇！下手亲人也毫不手软不光是丈夫和母亲，严仁淑在后来承认，和第一任丈夫生下的女儿也是她亲手推下楼梯的，和第二任丈夫生下的早产男孩也是被她害死的。 
 

严仁淑极端的反社会人格到底是什么时候产生的，其实她从小时候就表现出了异于常人的拜金、虚荣、冷血。这位轰动韩国的杀人骗保女魔头--严仁淑的经历，简直让人毛骨悚然。

title: 项目2：MOONWELL：基于 Moonbeam 和 Moonriver 的借贷协议（20220709）
body:
### 1，项目简介

Moonwell 是一个基于 Moonbeam 和 Moonriver 的开放借贷 DeFi 协议。Moonbeam（GLMR）是 Polkadot 上第一个完全兼容以太坊虚拟机 (EVM) 的平行链。Moonriver（MOVR）是 Moonbeam 在 Kusama 上的姊妹网络。代币方面，Moonwell 采取双币制，分别是：MFAM（Moonriver 网络）以及 WELL（Moonbeam 网络）。

### 2，为什么在Moonbeam上开发？

Moonbeam 是 Polkadot 上第一个完全兼容以太坊虚拟机 (EVM) 的平行链，既具有 Polkadot 的可扩展性和互操作性，又兼具以太坊的易用性，对以太坊开发者社区更友好。并且，由于 Moonbeam 与 EVM 兼容，以太坊、Fantom 和其他 EVM 兼容链的用户将能够使用 MetaMask 等熟悉的工具与 Moonwell 进行交互。

### 3，项目优点：

* 团队：核心团队由几位前 Coinbase 和 Google 工程师组成，联合创始人 Luke Youngblood 是前 Coinbase 高级参谋工程师和 AWS 首席工程师；
* 融资：2022年3月完成 1000 万美元融资，估值为 9000 万美元；
* 赛道：借贷，和DEX并列为各个生态最重要的赛道之一；
* 锁仓：
* 市值：代币总量50亿，目前价格0.0165刀，总市值8200万刀，熊市发币一直下跌，所有投资人目前都是被套的状态；

### 4，项目缺点：代币持续解锁

目前流通10%左右，在接下来两年会不断锁带来抛压，详情见报告：

[https://lunartechfdn.medium.com/well-transparency-report-8dfeb91f5176](https://lunartechfdn.medium.com/well-transparency-report-8dfeb91f5176)

### 5，交易平台的合约地址（截止2022年7月9日）：

MFAM token (ERC20)（Moonriver）可以在以下平台和交易所购买：

* Solarbeam DEX
* Hotbit
* MEXC

WELL token (ERC20)（Moonbeam）可以在以下平台和交易所购买：

* [Gate.io](http://Gate.io)

title: 最恨的毒妇：韩国骗保大案比李恩海还残忍，连家人也不放过
body:
2019年韩国骗保大案：2019年6月30号，妻子李恩海找来了好友曹贤洙、李贤珠等4男3女去平龙沼溪谷游玩，当时尹相烨也陪同妻子过去，傍晚时有一对情侣先回到停车场，只剩下了3男2女在溪谷边玩水，李恩海让3名男士玩一次跳水，在陆续跳水之后，曹贤洙和李贤珠很快回来了，但尹相烨却不见了，找不到的情况下报警，最终捞到了尹相烨，他溺毙在溪谷中。

由于尹相烨身上无外力袭击的痕迹，被认定为意外溺水，几个月后妻子李恩海找保险公司索赔8亿的赔偿，但保险公司认为尹相烨的死亡时间，离到期只有4个小时，一切都太巧合了，李恩海为丈夫买了4份巨额意外保险，保险公司认为有骗保的可能，李恩海眼看拿不到8亿，非常不满，求助媒体给保险公司施压，上了SBS的电视节目《我想知道真相》上。没成想施压无果，反而让节目组也起了疑心，开始调查。他们在调查中发现，妻子和情人在死者死亡前的半年中，还有两次谋杀行为，只不过都以失败告终。这次在保单有效期的最后几个小时，终于成功了。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bQp3z-1XTaYlvUSKNtFmW.png?height=732&width=1184)

死者夫妻合照

由于这些调查结果太过严重，2021年2月开始，仁川地方检察厅接手该案件，开始对李恩海进行了调查，并寻找到李恩海和情人赵贤洙涉嫌谋杀的证据。2021年12月，李恩海和赵贤洙被传唤调查。结果两人销声匿迹、下落不明。二人失踪后，警方发布了通缉令，然后李恩海两任前男友意外身亡的事情也被曝光，第一任男友2010年在一场车祸中丧生，李恩海当时在车上，事发后她获得了保险公司的一笔赔偿，第二任男友2014年在泰国芭堤雅潜水时出了意外，李恩海当时描述的情况，其实与警方调查有出入，但当时死者家人收到了抚恤金，也没有过多追究，李恩海又一次收到了保险金的赔偿。

2022年4月16日逮捕两人并移交检察厅，至此，此案的真相在两人的落网后水落石出。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/E25mXpJrnxRjO2k7Ge-Bt.png?height=898&width=1280)

韩国骗保还有比李恩海还狠的人，她就是韩国最著名的“连环残杀亲人巨额骗保案”主角——严仁淑。

严仁淑于1976年出生在江南江原道的一个普通家庭，上有一个哥哥，下有一个弟弟。她长相甜美，是不折不扣的天然美人坯子，在整形大国来说自然是众多男生簇拥追慕的对象。从小严仁淑就是个问题少女，严仁淑高中时就因为偷同学的钱被强制转学。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/r_b4R3OLlf7kG-PMzFGRW.png?height=1092&width=1154)

父母对她很是溺爱，父母以为严仁淑长大就会好起来，事情却和他们想的不一样。她不仅偷同学的钱，还偷母亲的嫁妆偷偷卖掉，高中的时候她父亲去世了，全家都很悲痛，而严仁淑当时居然偷了父亲的银行卡，疯狂买奢侈品！她的物欲超出常人，为了钱什么都做得出来。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/j1KoZBbVf-AiGzn7zPVkL.png?height=642&width=1280)

21岁的严仁淑孤身一人来到了首尔，她在这里找到了一份保险设计师的工作。名字听起来高大上，实际就是卖保险。在这个岗位上，她将保险行业的规则吃得非常透彻。补充一点，在韩国保险理赔的金额的高低，最高的是死亡，然后是失明和烧伤，所以这3种方法也贯穿严仁淑作案的这个始终，就是弄瞎、烧伤最后杀死！

保险行业没让严仁淑成为业绩高手，反而成为她后来泯灭人性的犯罪的技术指导。没过多久，严仁淑认识了在搬家公司工作的26岁男子李某。李某长相英俊，严仁淑很快和他坠入爱河。尽管两家人都不看好这段婚姻，严仁淑还是和李某结婚了。

李某对严仁淑有求必应，一开始两人相处得不错，还生下了一个女儿。但是李某的工资微薄，即使把工资全部上交也无法满足自己对奢侈生活的向往和追求两个人开始了争吵。

2000年2月份，他们三岁的女儿从楼梯摔下意外身亡，严仁淑和丈夫悲惨万分。他们短暂地和好了，李某觉得亏欠严仁淑很多，对她千依百顺。

但女儿的死是严仁淑彻底释放了狠毒与残忍，她表面和丈夫相互安慰，实际已经开始设计她的害人计划。在无法磨灭的丧女之痛中，保险公司的一笔赔付却让严仁淑在黑暗中看到一条邪恶之路。

**打开地狱之门**

2000年3月，严仁淑凭借从前保险设计师的工作经验，一个月内为丈夫买了四份高额的保险，所有的保险受益人都写了严仁淑自己的名字。同时，严仁淑声称因为丧女得了抑郁症，需要定期去精神病院看医生，每次医生都会给她开一些抗抑郁药和安眠药。

2000年5月，严仁淑给丈夫喝下了掺杂抗抑郁症药物的饮料，她趁丈夫迷糊时将他一把推下楼梯。

李某因为脑震荡住院治疗三周，出院次月又被妻子推下楼梯伪装成意外事故，严仁淑以此骗取了高额保险金。

李某接连受伤后，原本不喜欢严仁淑的婆家难道不怀疑她吗？

婆家确实一点没有怀疑过严仁淑，原因是李某以前就患过精神疾病。现在李某受了伤，严仁淑不离不弃的照顾让李家人很感动，不仅不怀疑，还要接纳严仁淑。

然而推下楼梯只是开胃菜，同年5月严仁淑还不满足，给丈夫喂下安眠药后，她趁丈夫睡着扒开了李某的眼皮，用别针扎瞎了李某右眼。李某刚治疗完眼睛出院，严仁淑又故技重施把热油淋到了李某脸上。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nDlEGXiFBVVDqUlTvGRF4.png?height=752&width=1168)

严仁淑之所以选择这样折磨李某，是因为她知道眼球受伤和烧伤是仅次于死亡外保额最高的赔偿项目。

李某一连串的受伤引起了医院的怀疑，医生找到李家人，劝他们仔细问问。

李某家人询问严仁淑时底气很不足，他们不太愿意相信严仁淑会害自己的儿子，只是试探道：“仁淑啊，你能再跟我说说我儿子是怎么受伤的吗？”

重复谎言很难，严仁淑没有上当，她故作柔弱地说：“这些伤都是老公精神病发作弄的，具体过程我也不清楚。老公是因为生病了，他不是故意伤害自己的，你们要怪就怪我吧，是我没有看住他。”

尽管这次试探被严仁淑完美躲过，她也因此收敛了几个月。

2000年9月，严仁淑再也忍不住，她直接用刀捅了李某的肚子，对外依旧宣传这是丈夫精神病发作的自残行为导致的。次年1月和2月，严仁淑又捅了丈夫两次。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Kp-hg1ekjpNkexcF24oJx.png?height=570&width=1280)

接二连三的受伤，李某因为并发症死在了治疗精神病的医院里。

严仁淑计划周密，当时的保险社之间也没有同步数据，她利用第一任丈夫轻松骗取了2亿韩币，让严仁淑可以任意挥霍一段时间。

**再次寻找猎物**

2001年5月，严仁淑就在夜店找到了下一个目标，31岁的林某。

严仁淑的长相美丽大方，出手阔绰，林某认为自己捡到了宝，高兴得不行。为了尽快嫁给林某，严仁淑从6月就开始和林某同居。严仁淑这次没有用真实身份，她谎称自己是名牌大学毕业的幼儿园老师，家里还有10亿财产等着她继承。

严仁淑只有嫁给林某才能骗保，她开始对自己进行全方位的包装，曾一次性花3000多万韩币给男友送新车。

2002年11月，严仁淑照搬对第一任丈夫的手法，给林某悄悄喂下了精神类药物，林某直接摔倒导致尾骨骨折。

林某差点变成瘫痪，严仁淑却不离不弃，他同意了结婚，严仁淑迅速拿着两人的印章登记。

摔倒、瞎眼和烧伤，严仁淑正想靠着三件套对林某为所欲为。可惜林某身体不如李某，林某在2003年2月治疗途中就因为伤口恶化离世了，严仁淑只骗取了4000万保险金。

林某家人不能接受儿子英年早逝，他们提议对林某进行尸检，严仁淑害怕被识破，当时怀孕5个月的她提出要和丈夫举办一场灵魂婚礼。严仁淑举办了盛大的婚礼，过程中她对丈夫的“真情流露”打消了林某家人的怀疑。

不过孩子刚出生不久便夭折了。

残害林某的案子就这样被严仁淑瞒天过海，危机解除后就带着钱去肆意挥霍了。

来钱快，去得更快。在奢靡中将钱财挥霍一空的严仁淑开始了新的恶毒计划。

第二次婚姻让严仁淑想明白了一件事，要诈骗其他人的保险，她必须长期投入且和对方结婚，毕竟杀死自己的丈夫这种方式的确太慢了，那只要是家人，不就可以直接下手了吗？

结婚需要时间，还是家人方便，严仁淑开始计划骗取家人的保险。

2003年7月，严仁淑喂母亲喝下了加有安眠药的果汁，他贴心地对母亲说：“妈妈，这个可是最新的保健品哦，喝了补充营养。”

母亲毫无防备地喝下果汁陷入昏迷，她又拿起注射针扎进了母亲右眼。同年11月，严仁淑对哥哥故技重施，趁哥哥睡着往他右眼倒了盐酸。有了两次经验的她，为了避免怀疑提前买好的保险里没有直接把受益人写成自己，哥哥的受益人是母亲，母亲的受益人是哥哥。

母亲和哥哥半年内都变成了瞎子，哥哥起了怀疑，他问严仁淑：“你回到家后，家里人都受伤了啊。”

严仁淑不打算放过哥哥，她趁护士不在对哥哥的吊瓶动了手脚，想用哥哥的死诈骗更高的保险金额，但哥哥被及时抢救没有死。

现在两个人都需要严仁淑照顾，按理说是会主动保险给她的。母亲毫无怀疑地给了严仁淑全部保险金，哥哥却因为知道严仁淑过去就花钱大手大脚，不同意把保险金一次性给她。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Lzih4XPWWJdTu7E1dxuEw.png?height=524&width=722)

严仁淑为了保险金又在家里呆了一年多，然后她就发现保险金不够花了。严仁淑没有放弃利用家里人，这次她盯上了一家四口居住的房子。

当哥哥像往常一样质问严仁淑到底把钱花到哪里时，严仁淑抓住机会说：“哥，我没有乱花钱，我把钱都攒起来买首尔的房子了。”

哥哥疑惑道：“你的钱够买首尔的房子吗？”

严仁淑狡黠地笑了起来：“不够啊，所以我想把我们家的旧房子卖掉，一起去首尔住新房子。”

哥哥不是很相信严仁淑的话，母亲却说：“哎呀，我们严仁淑真是长大了，这么漂亮，还这么有孝心。”

母亲帮严仁淑抵押房子还了钱，严仁淑也承诺了入住时间。

随着时间越来越近，严仁淑眼看着就瞒不下去了。哥哥问她：“房子呢？”

严仁淑装傻答：“在首尔啊。”

哥哥仿佛看穿了严仁淑的算盘，他挖苦道：“是什么房子？空气房吧，看不见摸不着，哈哈哈哈哈哈。”

哥哥的嘲讽让严仁淑怒火中烧，她要一把火烧了这个家，这样问题就解决了。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XBkJ_GwuEMQoE2sFone5Q.png?height=726&width=1172)

严仁淑提前给全家下了安眠药，警觉的哥哥却提前醒过来扑灭了大火，他的手臂被烧伤，弟弟因为吸入太多烟尘造成呼吸道烧伤。。

严仁淑凭借火灾直接从保险公司骗到了2亿400万韩元，虽然骗到了钱，但严仁淑现在没有地方住了，她该去哪里落脚呢？

**善良的可怜人，带给全家灭顶之灾**

房子烧了后严仁淑无处可去，她找到了曾为自己工作过的保姆姜某。

姜某是个善良的人，要是其他人，她很愿意收留，可严仁淑已经拖欠了她好几个月工资了，她只能说：“我和老公孩子一家四口一起住，没有多余的房间了，实在怕委屈您啊。”

严仁淑摆出了一幅无助的样子，梨花带雨说：“我的家被烧了，我好害怕，好想你陪陪我。”

姜某也可怜严仁淑，她表情为难，一时拿不定主意。

严仁淑又承诺：“我只住一个月，离开时会还清拖欠的工资，还会给酬金。”

姜某让恶魔住进了家，但身价上亿的严仁淑住了好几个月都没有走，也丝毫没有要还工资的样子，每天对她颐指气使，还当她是下人。

姜某彻底生气了：“哎呦，从没有见过你这么抠的人，穿着名牌却连保姆的工资都付不起，该不会全是假货吧？”

姜某平时温温柔柔，严仁淑从来没想过会被她嘲讽，她态度软和了下来：“对不起，我明天就搬走，再给我一天时间收拾东西吧。”

姜某不是不讲情面的人，她同意严仁淑再住一晚，但是她不知道严仁淑因为她一句话已经起了杀心。

当天夜里，严仁淑将带火的毛巾扔到了姜家的沙发上，姜某的丈夫直接死亡，姜某的两个孩子也被严重烧伤。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/l-uaLOI1OCt1RDtVZzm8E.png?height=692&width=1280)

放完火后，严仁淑才想起来这场火灾不但不会给自己带来任何收益，而且还会被人怀疑。她怕还活着的姜某看出端倪，准备斩草除根，在医院应急通道倒上汽油准备纵火。

医院的监控拍到了严仁淑纵火过程，她当场被警察押回警察局审问。

回到警局后，严仁淑在警局拒不认罪，还不停做出奇怪的举动，声称女儿死后自己得了精神疾病，只要看到火花就忍不住纵火，她不是故意的。

警察当然不相信严仁淑的话，正准备先把她扣押起来，严仁淑却躺在地上口吐白沫，当场尿了出来。

严仁淑身高接近1米7，身材较好，皮肤白皙，五官精致，说话也很温柔。没有人看出，她和天使外表不同，有着最邪恶的内心。

警方也在一时之间被严仁淑的外表迷惑，虽然医生说严仁淑没有问题，但警方询问几句后还是放走了她。

严仁淑刚被放回去，她的亲弟弟却到了警局，他告诉警方姐姐身边的人都会不停受伤，有必要再好好调查一下姐姐。

不查不知道，一查吓一跳。五年时间里，严仁淑身边足足有8名因为相似原因死亡或受伤的人，累计领取保险金5亿6000万韩币，约330万人民币。

严仁淑被捕后，因为故意杀人罪等九项罪名被判处了无期徒刑，目前已经在清州女子监狱服刑。

严仁淑的计划不算高明，她最可怕的是让受害人家属感恩戴德，觉得她是忠贞不渝的好媳妇！下手亲人也毫不手软不光是丈夫和母亲，严仁淑在后来承认，和第一任丈夫生下的女儿也是她亲手推下楼梯的，和第二任丈夫生下的早产男孩也是被她害死的。 
 

严仁淑极端的反社会人格到底是什么时候产生的，其实她从小时候就表现出了异于常人的拜金、虚荣、冷血。这位轰动韩国的杀人骗保女魔头--严仁淑的经历，简直让人毛骨悚然。

title: Web3 的下一站会是智能手机吗｜【赫周刊】Clive’s Newsletter #16
body:
By [Clive SHD](https://www.cliveshd.com/author/clive/) in [Newsletter](https://www.cliveshd.com/tag/newsletter/) — Jul 9, 2022

**HI，又见面啦！**

本周，web3的开发者和智能手机厂商仿佛商量好了一样，来了一系列有趣的声明，今天我们就来盘点一下他们到底在策划些什么吧。

## 🗺 下一站，手机

Web3的基础设施在十多年期间经历了很多重大改进，但是本周的趋势有点让人觉得这次步子跨的着实有点大！

![](https://www.cliveshd.com/content/images/2022/07/Crypto-Moves-in-Application---Infrastructure-Cycles.jpg)

**Web3开发者已经打起了智能手机的主意。**

### #1 Solana高调宣布进军移动市场

![](https://www.cliveshd.com/content/images/2022/07/Saga.jpg)

在纽约的一次活动中，Solana推出了Saga手机，以及Android开发框架，该框架将允许开发人员为名为Solana Mobile Stack的钱包和应用程序创建移动体验。

与普通手机最大的区别在于其软件，它依赖于Solana Mobile Stack，为Web3提供功能和安全性支持。

Saga硬件则由OSOM设计和构建。这个名字听起来可能会很熟悉，因为该公司是由前Essential员工组成的。他们去年剧透了一款新智能手机，宣布其OSOM OV1将于2022年最后一个季度的某个时候上市。

Solana Saga将配备6.67英寸显示器、高通的Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 SoC、12GB RAM和128GB存储空间。

手机外形看起来与OSOM OV1几乎相同。设备的预订现已开放，缴纳100美元的押金可加入等候名单。

最终售价1000美元，预计将于2023年第一季度上市。

### #2 Polygon不甘示弱

![](https://www.cliveshd.com/content/images/2022/07/nothing-phone-1-teaser.jpeg.webp)

Polygon与Nothing合作，将Polygon技术与Nothing Phone集成。

该伙伴关系将从NFT会员开始。Polygon NFT将提供给那些帮助众筹Nothing发布会的人和预订Nothing Phone的客户。NFT将为持有人提供潜在好处，例如可以尽早获得产品等。

Nothing是由Carl Pei创立的，他共同创立了智能手机和技术品牌OnePlus。该公司吸引了iPod联合创始人Tony Fadell、Twitch联合创始人Kevin Lin和Reddit首席执行官兼联合创始人Steve Huffman等资深科技创作者，并将于7月12日为Nothing Phone举办发布会。

### #3 HTC加入混战

![](https://www.cliveshd.com/content/images/2022/07/a015069262dfa57be879247cd84b96b7.jpeg)

HTC周二推出了一款带有数字资产钱包和支持虚拟现实头盔功能的元宇宙手机。

Desire 22 Pro将通过HTC元宇宙Viverse的应用程序在没有VR设备的情况下提供丰富的元宇宙体验。用户将能够在以太坊和Polygon上创建虚拟头像和管理加密资产。

8GB RAM和128 GB存储设备在台湾的价格为11,990新台币（403美元），在英国的价格为399英镑（487美元），将可以在台湾、日本和欧洲购买。

### #4 ethOS说怎么能少了我操作系统呢

![](https://www.cliveshd.com/content/images/2022/07/E-ethos.jpg)

ethOS是支持Google Pixel 3和Pixel 5a的操作系统，允许用户直接访问加密应用程序。可以无线更新，搭载以太坊轻量节点。

ethOS 1.0现已推出。开发团队计划添加原生应用程序等功能，可以直接从相机和分散式消息中铸造NFT。

### 所以：

这波趋势中，不难看出是新兴手机尝试寻找市场，以及web3项目尝试走向大众，这两方的一拍即合。

这个过程需要解决的问题还很多：

* 如何安全保存钱包密钥？
* 手机被盗或者丢失之后资产如何找回？
* 与普通智能手机的用户体验差距？
* …

但是，通过智能手机原生支持web3的想法我认为是乐观的，能极大推动web3的认知和使用的普及。非常期待使用web3能够像使用移动支付一样普及的时代。

## 🗞 新闻

* Reddit正在推出一个新的NFT交易市场，允许以固定费率购买NFT个人资料照片（并在Reddit上使用它们）。用户不需要任何加密货币来购买，而是可以使用普通信用卡/借记卡。限量版NFT具有一些许可权，它们不像BAYSC那么宽松，但仍然很有趣。Reddit每月有约4亿活跃用户，这可能会让更多人认识NFT。
* 以太坊开发人员成功完成了另一个测试网络的合并。三轮测试已完成了两轮（Ropsten，Sepolia）等待Goerli测试完毕我们就能见证以太坊从PoW过度到PoS的共识模式了。
* 意大利经济发展部已拨出高达4600万美元来资助和发展区块链项目。

## 🍀 如何平衡工作和爱好

本周连续加班，脑子都快跟不上了。

上周刚刚做了一期视频，分享[如何平衡工作和爱好](https://youtu.be/YLk2rqdUDWs)，没想到这么快就用在了自己身上，感兴趣的可以观看。

发完这封邮件又要继续工作了，生命不息，奋斗不止，大家也一起加油吧！


***

**祝你新的一周生活愉快！**

title: 世界第一巨贪：家藏数吨黄金，有29架私人飞机，使国家倒退
body:
无论封建王朝还是现代社会对贪官，从古至今老百姓都是非常痛恨的。说起中国古代的贪官，和珅是非常有名的，清朝民间所流传的这一句话：和珅跌倒，嘉庆吃饱。和珅被嘉庆赐死后，抄得白银八亿两，不仅如此，还查封了他很多的当铺、店铺和田地。其总资产约三亿两白银，也就是说和珅的总资产约为十一亿两白银。乾隆年间朝廷每年的税收不过七千万两，和珅所藏匿的财产相当于当时清政府十五年的收入。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0Av0do3TjNzyN1ImkOtB7.png?height=606&width=1140)

但接下来要跟大家说的这个人物，比和珅还要大胆，他被称为是世界第一贪，据说他家中的黄金成吨，坐拥29架 私人飞机 ，还间接拖垮了一个国家的经济，到底这位比和珅还贪的人是谁呢？

**这个充满传奇色彩的贪官，就是菲律宾的总统费迪南德·马科斯**。

1917年，马科斯出生了。小时候的他聪明伶俐，在各个方面都有过人之处。所以父亲一直都期盼着他长大之后能有所成就。5岁的马科斯就接受了各种体能训练，毫不夸张地说，在体育方面，马科斯算得上是一个神童了，他甚至还获得过全国射击比赛的冠军。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Sk-faHU0o_mKFknVwDFCU.png?height=669&width=1167)

在体育方面如此优秀的他，学习成绩也名列前茅。原本马科斯应该按照父亲的规划，顺利进入政坛，然后大展拳脚。只可惜，1935年，马科斯的父亲卷入了政治事件，当时他的父亲马里亚诺在众议员的竞选中，败给了老对手胡利奥·纳伦达桑，纳伦达桑在家中设宴，庆祝再次竞选众议员成功时，被一颗穿窗而过的子弹击中要害，当场死亡。身为射击高手的马科斯，自然也引起了警方的注意。经过长达三年的调查之后，马科斯被判处有期徒刑17年。

马科斯可是一位即将毕业的优秀的法律专业学生。拥有超强辩论能力的他，运用自己所学的知识，在法庭上为自己申辩。更“巧合”的是，有人在这时站出来证实，在纳伦达桑遇害当晚，马科斯正在家里，他并没有作案时间。于是法院最终判决马科斯父子无罪，当庭释放。此事件之后，马科斯的传奇人生才刚刚开始。

没过多久，日本和菲律宾正式开战。为了守护自己的国家，马科斯决定立刻参军，到前线冲锋陷阵。因为他掌握着高超的射击技术，很快就在战场上立下了赫赫战功，马科斯荣获“抗日英雄”的称誉，此外还荣获三十余枚各种荣誉勋章，也因此他成为菲律宾军史中获得勋章最多的战士。战争结束之后，马科斯的想法发生了转变，他决定和父亲一样，进入政坛。马科斯由于在抗战中个人能力出众，而且很懂得为人处事，他一跃成为了当时总统的秘书。

经过一段时间的锻炼，马科斯成功当选了参议院成员。刚开始，马科斯对待工作的态度还比较认真，为了改善国内的情况，他提出了许多有建设性的提议。不仅如此，他还解决了菲律宾的退役老兵问题，同时还提倡大家尊重女性，大幅度提高了女性在国内的社会地位。

职场上顺风顺水，马科斯认识了自己的妻子伊美尔达。一个是娱乐圈炙手可热的女明星，一个是政坛举足轻重的新秀。伊梅达尔和马科斯认识仅仅11天，就步入了婚姻的殿堂。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m-AlTWEuplS1BI25ds-KD.png?height=733&width=612)

当时，任菲律宾总统的——拉蒙·麦格赛还受邀给他们做了证婚人。可见，其隆重程度绝非一般。之后，马科斯参加大选，伊梅达尔又利用自己的知名度给丈夫四处拉票，哪怕是穷乡僻壤，只要观众想听，她都会放下身段高歌一曲，马科斯在工作中得到了妻子的鼎力支持。

20世纪50年代末期，菲律宾是仅次于日本的亚洲第二富国，马尼拉号称亚洲纽约，亚洲开发银行的总部就在马尼拉，对比当时在“三年困难时期”的中国，还有韩国还是个贫穷的农业国，由此可见当时菲律宾在亚洲的地位。

1965年马科斯在伊梅尔达的鼎力相助下终于在48岁时成为菲律宾总统，36岁的伊梅达尔，也摇身一变成了第一夫人。上任之初，马科斯履行曾经的诺言，对政府进行一番整顿，马科斯迅速在教育和土地改革上推行了一系列正面措施。在此期间菲律宾的农业、工业和教育都有很好的发展，这也成为马科斯顺利连任的政绩。国家发展欣欣向荣，表现工作做完了，马科斯与伊梅尔达这对夫妇开始享受权利赋予的能力。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fh3V33BaeyNH_STl-yrum.png?height=667&width=1186)

他贪污了一个国家的财富

其实早在马科斯当选议员的时候，熟悉他的人背后称马科斯为“百分之十先生”，也就是所有马斯克经手的项目，他都索要总价值百分之十的好处，可谓是雁过拔毛。而在他当选总统后，这种常例慢慢被公开化、制度化，涉及范围也遍及各方各面，可以说菲律宾全国各种与钱沾上边的事业，甚至财政支出都有马科斯的百分之十。如此大的贪腐，却只是马科斯敛财的手段之一。

在他第二个任期期间，国内出现不少反对派，为了保住宝座，马科斯宣布全国实行军事管制，禁止所有政党活动，开始了他的独裁统治。手中握有绝对的权力后，马科斯的贪腐行为更为疯狂。当时日本赔付菲律宾五亿美元的战争赔款，装进他的腰包。好不容易从世界银行贷出的十几亿美元，还没有看见影子，直接转入他的账户，甚至其他国家对菲律宾的援助金，他也没有放过，全都进了自己的账户。凭借着铁血手腕，马科斯在总统一位一待就是二十年。

为了更好地辅佐丈夫，伊梅尔达也步入政坛。 她曾一度担任马尼拉市市长，社会福利部部长，并且因伊梅尔达姣好的容颜和形象，马科斯经常让伊梅尔达担任总统特使出访世界。每次出访伊梅尔达都会穿着菲律宾传统服装，为国家带来并树立了非常好的印象和形象。

由于伊梅尔达经常出访，使得伊梅尔达在菲律宾国内的风头一度盖过了总统。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5prWhaY_KLntkg0RlMChZ.png?height=1012&width=1197)

奢靡第一夫人——伊梅尔达。

伊梅达尔，能歌善舞，深受马科斯的宠爱。据悉，她每次出国访问回来后，马科斯都会给她送一幅画，上面写着：你不在时，我只能忍受寂寞。落款则是：永恒的爱！伊梅达尔和马科斯的爱情故事，传遍了菲律宾的大街小巷，民众更是视他们为典范。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/o4zAuZdDZDcF-dn6jH2aB.png?height=717&width=594)

可马科斯在地位稳固后，竟看上了一个三流女星，为了和对方幽会，他常常借着工作之由，将伊梅达尔调离府邸。可床下的录音机，早就把他们翻云覆雨的过程传给了伊梅达尔。

**对爱情失望，对名利痴狂。自此，这位“贤能淑德”的第一夫人，性情大变，放纵挥霍，成为了全民公敌。**

觉得纽约的皇冠大楼很漂亮，于是她大手一挥就将其买了下来，顺便，还买了旁边的四栋大楼；觉得巴黎的珠宝店很闪耀，于是她又豪掷千金，将其收入囊中；觉得非洲的野生动物很有趣，伊梅达尔甚至违抗禁令，将它们一批又一批地运回了国，为了安置这些“宠物”，她还把卡劳伊岛上的254户居民全部驱逐。

人们怨声载道，马科斯坐视不理，独裁的马科斯任人唯亲，奉行朋党主义，使得菲律宾的社会财富，和国家的发展成果，几乎全部都被马科斯家族以及其追随者瓜分。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Uuw2TIoj8Ydbu4K59i-KP.png?height=960&width=1108)

**菲律宾第一夫人伊梅尔达，她一路升迁，从马尼拉市长一路官至国家议会主席**。 很多人都觉得马科斯此举是为了让夫人接替国家总统之位。加之马科斯政府又在此时同美国的产生裂痕，使得一直反对马科斯流亡美国阿基诺二世得到了美国的支持，迎来回国竞选的机会。

1986年，马科斯的劲敌阿基诺二世流亡结束返回国内。怎料一下飞机，就被人一枪爆头了。而此次暗杀，也成了压垮马科斯政权的最后一根稻草。

亲信叛变、军队倒戈，生死存亡之际，马科斯和伊梅达尔求助美国，连夜乘坐直升机前往了夏威夷。

可过海关的时候，他们随身携带的300箱行李，竟被美国以“保护财产”为由扣了下来，直至马科斯去世，他都没要回自己的财产。

而菲律宾民众在他们离开后，冲进府邸，大肆搜刮财物。

除了5000条短裤、3000双皮鞋、2000副手套、1700个名牌包、500件胸衣、200多双袜子外……警察还从他们的后花园，搜出了100多公斤的珠宝。内衣裤袜等等不计其数。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Av69eXlDTqzCCmbSb9m7W.png?height=874&width=1320)

其豪奢程度简直令人咋舌！

**据调查，马科斯在任期间，贪污的款项高达100亿美元，这一金额是菲律宾全国近几年的经济收入。在马科斯的名下有29架私人飞机，各种豪宅与珠宝首饰更是不计其数，他还有着232家的公司，他家中的黄金储备量更是以吨来计算。**

在美国、澳大利亚、瑞士、巴西也都有房产和巨额存款，没人知道他们具体多有钱，虽然马科斯夫妇的政治生涯结束，但他们的后半生依然过得精彩，因为他们盗窃了一个国家的财产，但在1989年，马科斯因心力衰竭病逝于夏威夷，终年72岁，而客死异乡的马科斯也是直到2016年才移葬回国。

一个国家的进步与英明的领导者有很大关系，马科斯利用自己在菲律宾掌权的这二十年，疯狂收敛财富，他凭借一己之力，成功拖垮了整个菲律宾，让菲律宾从一个亚洲经济发展的强国沦为了一个必须依靠接债度日的国家，**作为国家的统治者，百姓的利益应该放在第一位**。

今年5月9日，菲律宾总统选举结果终于出炉，现年65岁的小马科斯高票当选菲律宾总统，沉寂36年之久的马科斯家族再次回归。小马科斯**于6月30日12时在菲律宾国家博物馆正式宣誓就职，成为菲律宾第17任总统**。小马科斯能否吸取父亲的教训，创造菲律宾经济奇迹，领导菲律宾制定妥善的国内外政策，不宜过早下结论，还需要时间来验证。

有一次我妈妈的姐姐养了一只狗，它叫尼禄 我妈妈现在死于癌症，我有同样的脸和 10 岁以下的香烟 10 10 我听不见。 当我还是个孩子的时候，我一直想有一条尾巴，就像那样 我以前用别针把浴袍绳子系在裤子上。 或一根线 细绳。然后我跑进了花园。花园是一片柏油路。 一天 狗踩到我的尾巴，我跪倒在地。我记得骨头 肉下白色。我妈妈让我坐在马桶上，洒在马桶上 乙醇。 一天打架时，我膝盖在地毯上滑了一米 波斯语。当你放下塑料勺时，皮肤皱巴巴的 在热炉上。膝盖是我最喜欢的东西。我不喜欢眼睛，它们让我生气。 他们很粘，我知道他们必须这样做 随时爆炸，他们让我生气，他们让我生气。如果有 我看到一切都很好，但如果我开始考虑它，我必须转身离开。我 他们糟透了，他们造就了我。所有这些小共鸣。 他们太精致了，精致的东西让我生气。如果我拿一个别针把它插进去怎么办？我什至可以刺穿眼睑。
